[\[15a.5\]]stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_nor bu dang /_dmag dpon dang /_btsun mo dang /_blon po dang bdun no/_/yang na gser dang dngul dang zangs dang shel dang byi ru dang /_dung dang /_ma ra ka ta dang bdun no/_/de stong 'byung bar

[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]mthu dang stobs kyis bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba ni/_zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog ljang gu/phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal pa dang bum pa bsnams pa'o/_/seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs
[\[15b.2\]]pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_'od dang ldan pa/_stobs dang ldan pa/_grags pa dang ldan pa/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi rtsod pa nus pa/_byang phyogs kyi gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon byang phyogs la nga bdag byed pa'o/_/stan las langs te zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/_/bla
[\[15b.3\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bskor ba lan gsum byas pa'o/_/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der zhes pa ni dgra bcom pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa'i spyan
[\[15b.4\]]sngar ro/_/logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas zhes pa ni/_lus ngag yid gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni lus ngan gyi tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la zhes pa ni gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas
[\[15b.5\]]pa'o/_/grong dang zhes pa ni pho brang la sogs pa'o/_/skyed mos tshal zhes pa ni gnod sbyin rgyu ba'i gnas so/_/gzhal med khang zhes pa ni gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/khang pa brtsegs pa dang zhes pa ni/_sum brtsegs yin te gnod sbyin gyi gnas so/_/
[\[15b.6\]]bsil khang dang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin pho dang mo'i gnas so/_/sgo khang zhes pa ni sgo khang na gnas pa'o/_/rta babs zhes pa ni mtshams mtshams su brgyan pa'o/_/yang na rta babs zhes pa ni ka ba dang /_ri dgas shar Na dang /_klung 'brug nar dang /_chu srin twa ra dang /_
[\[15b.7\]]bya khyung ga ru Da la sogs pa'o/_/dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /_mu tig gi dra ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_ji lta ba bzhin du mdzes par brgyan pa'o/_/skar khung zhes bya ba ni mtshams mtshams su logs logs su zhes bya'o/_/skar khung
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]la yang mu tig dang /_byi ru dang /_mu men dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_shel gyis ji bzhin du mdzes par brgyan pa'o/_/dar gyi lda ldi bzang zhing mdzes pa rnams zhes bya ba ni pho brang gi nang na'o/_/sna tshogs dang ldan zhes pa ni/_rnga ma dkar

[\[16a.7\]]pa'o/_/bdag cag ces pa ni rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu myos pa'i bag ma mchis par gnas pa zhes pa ni myos pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas myos pa'o/_/des ma thos pas chos dang mi ldan pa'o/_/'khor zas dang skom tshol du phyogs bcu kun du
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]'byer zhing /_skyes pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_rims la sogs pa zas dang skom la sogs pa tshol ba'o/_/bud med dang zhes bya ba ni bud med bu skyes pa'i dus su yang zas tshol ba'o/_/bud med kyi gzugs su byas nas so/_/khye'u dang zhes bya ba ni/_

[\[16b.3\]]pa'i zhes pa ni dud 'gro la gnod par byed pa'o/_/srog chags rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog 'tshe bar bgyid ces bya ba ni srog chags zhes bya ba ni mi la sogs pa'o/_/mdangs 'phrog ces bya ba ni/_nad rnams mdze la sogs pa thams cad gtong pa'i bdag po'o/_/yang na dge ba'i rtsa ba

[\[18a.2\]]pa'o/_/gnod sbyin gzugs ni sna tshogs gzugs yin te/_gnod pa rang yang sna tshogs su skyel lo/_/rgyal po dang mi dang byol song la yang gnod pa skyel ba ste/_nad sna tshogs gtong ba la sogs pa'o/_/mtshan ma 'di lta bu yin te zhes bya ba ni/_gzugs ni sna tshogs

[\[18b.1\]]med par khro ba ste/_/yang na rang gi lus la smyon pa bzhin du byas pas te/_rang la lceb pa dang /_khro zhing gzhan la rdeg pa'o/_/de ni gnyid kyang log par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_de gnyid ces bya ba ni nad pa ste/_gnyid log pa'i dus su 'dzin pa'o/_/yang na shin tu bro

[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pa'o/_/dbang phyug dang ni gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du bsdus te/_dbang bskur ba'i phyir gnod pa mi skyed pa'o/_/byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ni rig sngags dang sangs rgyas dang rnam thos kyi bus byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni lus ngan gyi

[\[19a.3\]]dri za thams cad mnga' mdzad pa/_/shar phyogs ngos kyi mnga' bdag yin/_/dri za pho mo gzi ldan pa/_/dri za'i rgyal po de yang brjod/_/gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/_/lha dang lha min 'khrug rtsod ldan/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/stan las

[\[19a.5\]]'das la dge slong gi phyag ces bya ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis gsungs pa'o/_/ga la ba de zhes pa ni mdun du'o/_/thal mo sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni mgo bos phyag btsal nas gus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni
[\[19a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang gzi brjid dang stobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung ngo /_/'khor dri za'i gdon gyis btab pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni 'di lta bu ste/_gzugs bzang dang ni skye legs dang /_/byang mtshar
[\[19a.7\]]dri zhim glu la dga'/_/me tog dri dang dri ma sogs/_/sems can thams cad gnod pa skyel/_/mer mer po dang nur nur po/_/bu yi sa bon ma lus dag_/skyes nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa dag_/byis pa rnams ni 'jigs par byed/_/zas su za ba bu ram zho/_/shar gyi ngos na gnod par
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]byed/_/dri za nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams/_/de kun shar phyogs rgyu ba dag_/dri za 'khor g.yog sa ya 'bum phrag dag bstan pa'o/_/mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu dag yin te zhes bya ba'o/_/glu len cing zhes bya ba ni glu la shin tu dga' ba'o/_/yang na nad pas smyo ba'i tshul du glu len pa'o/_/bro brdung
[\[19b.2\]]zhing zhes bya ba ni/_rol mo'i tshogs la shin tu dga' ba ste/_yang na nad pa smyo zhing gar byed pa'o/_/rgyan rnams la yang dga' bar bgyid/_/ces pa ni rgyan rnams la sogs dga' ba ste/_dri dang dri ma la sogs pa la shin tu dga' ba'o/_/yang na nad pa zho dang bu ram la sogs pa
[\[19b.3\]]la dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'o/_/brkam pa ma mchis zhes bya ba ni mi bden pa'i tshig yin te bden par smra ba'o/_/mang bar smra zhes bya ba ni/_med pa ni mi brtan pa ste/_phra ma'i tshig smra bar 'dod pa'o/_/dgod par byed cing zhes bya ba ni/_smyo ba'i tshul du yin te/_don

[\[19b.5\]]btab ste dmar ba'o/_/yang na rims kyis btab pa bzhin du'o/_/rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni ma shi bar gyi tshe na nad kyis thebs pa'o/_/mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyid de/_/zhes bya ba ni/_mig nad ni rgas rgas su 'byung ba'o/_/rgyab kyis

[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]rgyas dang stong chen mo dang rgyal po chen po rnams kyis srung ba'o/_/byin gyis zhes pa ni sangs rgyas so/_/bdag gdon thams cad dang zhes pa ni stong phrag brgyad cu'o/_/gnod pa thams cad las zhes bya ba ni 'dir dri za la sogs pa'o/_/thar bar gyur cig
[\[20a.2\]]swA hA zhes pa ni/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi nad zhi bar gyur cig ces pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni yul 'khor srung gis bshad pa'i de nas so/_/rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba ni zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ba/_g.yas pa gnyis na bsnams pa ni/_/dbyug
[\[20a.3\]]to dang ni mda' 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yon pa gnyis na bsnams pa ni/_/rin chen dang ni gzhu bsnams pa'o/_/sku mdog ser po me yi 'od/_/stag gi gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/nyi shu rtsa brgyad grul bum gdon/_/ma mo la sogs de bzhin 'khor/_/gtso bor gyur pa de rnams ni/_/
[\[20a.4\]]grul bum gdon ni bsam mi khyab/_/ri rab rtse mo'i lho phyogs na/_/grul bum gdon rnams gnas pa yin/_/lho phyogs mi la gnod par byed/_/lho phyogs ngos ni grul bum gdon/_/sna tshogs nad ni gtong bar byed/_/rlung dang bad kan 'dus ba dang /_/mdze dang lhog pa shu ba
[\[20a.5\]]dang /_/phol mig dang ni g.yan pa dang /_/sha bkra dang ni me dpal dang /_/'brum bu'i nad rnams gtong bar byed/_/ske bong che la skad che ba/_/me ri chen po'i 'od dang mtshungs/_/mig gcig pa dang mig gsum po/_/mjug gcig pa dang mjug gnyis pa/_/mgo gcig pa dang
[\[20a.6\]]mgo gnyis pa/_/mgo bzhi pa dang gdong gsum ma/_/rkang gcig pa dang rkang gsum pa/_/rkang pa dag ni gnam la lta/_/mi yi pags pa gon pa dang /_/mi mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal can/_/mi yi rus pas brgyan pa dang /_/'jigs pa chen po'i 'od 'bar ba/_/rdzu 'phrul

[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bud med dang /_/rmi lam du ni bstan pa'o/_/grul bum gyi gdon gyi mtshan ma bstan pa'o/_stan las langs te zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas pa'o/_/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas zhes pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das dang dgra bcom pa

[\[20b.5\]]g.yo ba dang /_mgo bo che ba dang /_skra ring ba dang /_kha yo ba dang /_la la ni sha che ba/_la la ni sha skam pa/_rtag tu sems can la gnod pa byed pa'o/_/mtshan ma ni 'di lta bu lags te zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_nad pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/shin tu skom pas 'debs par 'gyur/_/
[\[20b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni/_bu chung la sogs pa yin te/_ma yi mngal nas bzung nas ni/_/skyes ma thag tu nad kyis 'debs/_/g.yeng bas btab cing lta bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni g.yeng bas ni byas pas 'jigs pa'o/_/btab cing ni 'dar bas 'jigs pa'o/_/lta bar 'gyur ni
[\[20b.7\]]mig ldog cing gyen du lta ba'o/_/bzhin yang ni mig dang lus ni dmar ba'o/_/dmar por lta bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_kha nas khrag tu skyugs pa'o/_/bskum nas zhes bya ba ni nad pa'i rkang lag 'khums pa'o/_/'khums pa'i
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]nad kyis ma shi yang glen par 'gro ba'o/_/sa la nyal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/_'gul mi nus pa'o/_/gal te 'gro na rkang lag sa la mi tshugs pa'o/_/kha dog ngan zhing zhes bya ba ni mdze dang phol mig btab pa'o/_/lus kyang skem pa zhes bya ba ni glo'i nad kyis

[\[22a.1\]]dpa' la/_bskor ba lan gsum byas nas mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du ste/_yang na ni dge slong

[\[23a.7\]]par smin pa 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu thob pa la sogs pa mkhyen pa'o/_/thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa ni 'dis ni mngon par mtho ba thob pas thams cad kyi lam mo/_/'di ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i nges par legs pa thob cing bgrod par byed pa'i lam la sogs
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]pa mkhyen pa'o/_/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ni sngon gyi yul 'dir las 'di lta bur blangs te pha ni 'di la ma ni 'di/_'di lta bu la sogs pa zhib tu mkhyen pa'o/_/'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa ni gang zag 'di dus 'di mi tshe rgyu 'di lta bu zhig gis shi 'phos nas

[\[23b.3\]]bzhis 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas nas de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha 'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs

[\[23b.5\]]par spyod pa dang /_khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bcas pa'o/_/'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan su yang rung ste/_chos dang ldan pa bskor bar
[\[23b.6\]]mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/_de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan
[\[23b.7\]]su yang rung ste/_chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/_/bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/_de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/_khyu mchog rlabs
[\[24a.2\]]po che'i gnas su dam bcas pa'o/_/'khor gyi nang na seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/_/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_gzhan sus kyang rung ste/_chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar
[\[24a.3\]]bya'o/_/gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos yongs su bstan pa de dag la brten nas/_bar chad kyi chos su 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/_'jig rten na chos dang ldan pa rgol

[\[28b.1\]]lo/_/gnod sbyin chad pa ni zhes bya ba ni nad chen po sna tshogs so/_/sdig pa ni sems can thams cad la'o/_/de yi rtsib logs g.yas par ni/_/'bras chen nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni bka' las 'das pa de la'o/_/yang na ni gang gis gnod par byed pa de la'o/_/gnod

[\[28b.3\]]'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i bka' las 'gal gyur na/_rnam thos kyi bu'i pho brang du 'ong mi ster te/_gnod sbyin rnams kyis chad pas gcod par 'gyur ro/_/lus ngan grogs dang ldan pa yi/_/khyim yang mthong bar mi 'gyur te/_/zhes pa ni 'gro ba
[\[28b.4\]]lta ci smos te/_mthong bar yang mi ster zhing /_gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang ring po nas bkag pa'o/_/'byung po mang po tshogs pa na/_/stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes pa ni gal te pho brang du 'ongs par 'gyur na/_bsdad sa med par skyes te/_'byung po rnams kyis
[\[28b.5\]]brnyas par byed de/_sdug bsngal mang po myong ba'o/_/gnod sbyin dag gi dkyil 'khor du/_/zas skom dang yang bral bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni 'ongs par gyur kyang mi ster te/_gal te sbyin yang lcags kyi rdog po dang /_/
[\[28b.6\]]me'i phung por mthong ba'o/_/de bas na lha dang /_mi dang /_yi dgas dang /_'byung po la sogs pa yang /_rig sngags 'di'i bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/_/stong chen rab 'joms mdo sde la/_/zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po rten gyi gang zag la la zhig dkon mchog gsum la
[\[28b.7\]]skyabs su song ba/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma/_rdo rje'i rig sngags 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_bsgom pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_bshad pa de la/_gnod sbyin 'byung po'i bar chad byed pa de la/_spyi bo
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]dag ni zhes bya ba nas/_de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba'i bar na chad pa chen po bdun gcod pa'o/_/sus gcod ce na rdo rje 'chang gis gcod pa'o/_/gnod sbyin 'byung pos bar chad byed pa de la zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i bka' las 'da' ba
[\[29a.2\]]dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba rnams la bar chad byas na sdug bsngal thams cad de'i lus la 'byung ngo /_/de la rdo rje 'chang khros te/_/spyi po dag ni 'gems par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lag na rdo rje khros te/_de'i stobs kyis 'byung po rnams la chad pa
[\[29a.3\]]bcad pa'o/_/ci'i phyir chad pa gcod ce na/_de'i rnam par smin pas a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/spu gri'i so ni rtsub mo yis/_/de yi lce ni gcod par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' las 'das pa dang /_lag na rdo rje'i ye
[\[29a.4\]]shes kyi spu gris de'i lce gcod pa'o/_/mtshon cha shin tu rnon po yis/_/de yi sna dang rna ba gcod/_/zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin du/_de'i rnam smin gyis sna dang lce gcod pa'o/_/'khor lo spu gri'i so 'dra bas/_/klad pa rab tu gshegs par byed/_/ces bya ba ni nam mkha' nas las
[\[29a.5\]]kyi 'khor lo 'byung bas/_spyi bo nas lte ba'i bar du gcod pa'o/_/tho ba lcags kyis dkris pa yis/_/de yi snying la 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba ni bar snang nas lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis/_bka' las 'das pa de'i snying ni 'joms pa'o/_/rnag dang khrag ni dron mo dag_/
[\[29a.6\]]de yi kha nas 'dzag par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_don snying lnga la nad zhugs shing /_rnag dang khrag rtag tu 'dzag pa'o/_/rig sngags zhags pa'i chad pa yis/_/rtag tu 'khor bar 'gro ba na/_/zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du rig sngags kyis dmod pa'i zhags pa'i las des rtag tu
[\[29a.7\]]'khor bar 'khyam pa'o/_/'khor ba gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor du/_/de nyid du ni 'khor bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni de bas na 'di'i bka' las 'da' bar mi bya zhing /_/sems can rnams la gnod pa mi bya'o/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu song gyur nas/_/zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di la gus
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]pa'i gang zag skyong ba ste/_rgyal po bzhi po dag gis ni phyogs phyogs nas srung ba'o/_/chos kyi go cha bgos gyur te/_/bzang po'i khri la 'dug pa ni/_/zhes pa ni byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyi go cha gyon pa/_seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs nas
[\[29b.2\]]sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/zhes bya ba ni dri za'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas/_shar phyogs skyong ba'o/_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/zhes bya ba ni grul bum gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas lho phyogs
[\[29b.3\]]skyong ba'o/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/zhes bya ba ni klu'i ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pas/_nub phyogs skyong ba'o/_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang bcas pas/_byang phyogs skyong ba'o/_/dpal dang
[\[29b.4\]]gzi brjid 'bar ba yi/_/rgyal po dag ni phyin pa dang /_/zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du dpal dang ldan zhing /_sde bo che dpung bzhi'i bdag po ste/_de'i gzi brjid kyis gling bzhi khyab pa'o/_/phyin pa ni khyab pa'o/_/de'i tshe ston pa thams cad mkhyen/_/bar snang gnas la rab tu
[\[29b.5\]]'phags/_/zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang /_sems can gyi don la gnas pa ste/_nor bu rin po che dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi khams rang gi lag mthil du shes pa/_sems can rnams las 'phags pa'o/_/tshangs pas sprul pa'i gzhal
[\[29b.6\]]med khang /_/der ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs/_/zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa bzhi bsgoms pas tshangs pa ste/_gzhal med khang ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin lha'i sku'o/_/yang na gzhal med khang ni ri rab chen por snang ba 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo/_/de lta bu'i gzhal yas
[\[29b.7\]]khang gi nang na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin snang ba'o/_/de nas tshangs dang tshangs chen rnams/_/thal mo sbyar 'khod phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]tshangs chen rnams kyis gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/dpal ldan gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/gser gyi mchod sdong dang yang mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba ni phyi nang med par gser gyi yon tan dang ldan te/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad
[\[30a.2\]]cus brgyan pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra zhing /_yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/me tog pad+ma bzhin du rgyas/_/sA la'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyas/_/zhes bya ba ni zhal pad+ma bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan pa/_shing sA la bzhin du zil gyis non pa'o/_/nyi ma
[\[30a.3\]]dang 'dra zla nya la/_/skar ma rnams kyis yongs bskor zhing /_/zhes bya ba ni dregs pa ni nyi ma lta bu ste/_'jam pa ni zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'khor rnam bzhi ni skar ma lta bu'o/_/thub sku gser gyi kha dog la/_/mtshan rnams
[\[30a.4\]]kyis ni yongs su bskor/_/zhes bya ba ni sku gsung thub cing 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/_sku la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o/_/'jig rten mes bo tshangs pa yis/_/'jig rten sgron ma bstod byas te/_/zhes
[\[30a.5\]]bya ba ni stong spyi phud kyi rgyal po tshangs pas kyang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can thams cad 'khor ba nas sgrol ba/_stong gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal zhing bstod do/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/_/'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras/_/
[\[30a.6\]]zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gtso bo ste/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba/_phyogs skyong bcus kyang zhus pa'o/_/'jig rten skyong gi 'khor rnams kyis/_/rjes su bstan pa ma thob ste/_/zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[30a.7\]]'di/_yid bzhin nor bu rin po che 'dra ba ste/_'jig rten skyong ba dag gis kyang 'di dang gzhan du mtshungs pa med pa'o/_/gang phyir 'di las sangs rgyas dang /_/rang sangs rgyas dag 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/zhes bya ba ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i lam 'di nas/_rin po che shel dang /_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]'dra ba ste/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa gang yang 'byung ba'o/_/'di las nyan thos rnams kyang skye/_/lha rnams dag kyang skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes pa ni nam mkha' las char byung ba bzhin du/_/'di'i sgo nas gang yang 'byung ba'o/_/rig byed yan lag drug mthar phyin/_/bram ze rnams kyang
[\[30b.2\]]skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'i chos drug yin te/_de yang sngar bshad pa bzhin du lta ba drug go/_/de rnams mthar phyin cing grol ba ste/_'di'i sgo nas skye gnas bzang po bram ze'i rigs thob pa'o/_/drang srong skal ba chen po dang /_/dge sbyong bram ze 'di las skye/_/zhes bya ba
[\[30b.3\]]ni stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i sgo nas lta ba thams cad 'byung ba'o/_/khyed cag snying las chung byed pa/_/mi yi skye dgu gnod par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams 'jigs skrag byed pa/_mi rnams la byams pa dang /_snying rjer ldan pa'o/_/tshangs pa yi ni
[\[30b.4\]]tshig thos nas/_/'jig rten skyong gis tshig smras pa/_/zhes bya ba ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i tshig thos nas/_'byung po rnams la phyogs skyong ba bcus smras pa'o/_/tshangs pa dang ni thub chen po/_/zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang

[\[31a.1\]]bcas la/_/lha dang lha min 'byung po dang /_/de rnams la ni dbul bar bya/_/rgyal po dang ni rgyal po'i 'khor/_/blon po dang ni blon mo dang /_/gang dag de rnams gnod pa dang /_/'byung po yi dgas sogs gnod dang /_/byad stems dang ni 'thor ba dang /_/

[\[31b.1\]]klu btsan la sogs gzhan rnams dang /_/byang phyogs dag ni yang dag shes/_/stong phrag brgyad cu nyi shu rtsa brgyad phrag_/de dag byang phyogs gdon rnams so/_/shar lho lho nub nub byang dang /_/byang shar steng dang 'og dang ni/_/me yi gdon dang bden bral dang /_/rlung lha'i gdon dang 'byung

[\[32a.1\]]par bya/_/rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong dang /_/gza' dang skar ma la sogs la/_/'khor lo lha rnams sgo rnams la/_/mkhas pas yang dag shes par bya/_/lnga'am gcig gam gang 'byor yang /_/gang ba'i bum pa bkra shis pa/_/lnga pa'i dbus su

[\[32a.3\]]dpon lnga'am gcig kyang rung /_/yang dag gis ni rim pa bzhin/_/'byung po rnams ni dgug par bya/_/stong chen rab tu 'joms ma yang /_/phyogs bzhi'i mtshams su rgyun mi 'chad/_/slob dpon dgongs pa gsum ldan pas/_/ngag ma 'dres par bzlas par bya/_/zhes bstan pa'o/_/

[\[32a.7\]]pa'i rgyu skar rnams bcing ba'o/_/gang dag rab tu sdang byed cing /_/'jig rten la ni phan mi byed/_/ces bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu zhing /_/gnod pa skyel ba rnams la rig sngags kyi bcing ba lngas bcings pa'o/_/de dag la ni thams cad du/_/

[\[32b.1\]]phyogs kyang snang bar mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gnod pa skyel ba'i 'byung po rnams/_phyogs bcu rnams su gnas pa'i sa med par/_/sdug bsngal drag po myong ba'o/_/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa de/_/'byung po rnams kyi phyir smod de/_/zhes bya ba ni lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la

[\[32b.3\]]rig sngags las ni 'da' byed pa/_/zhes bya ba ni 'di la gus par byed cing dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i gang zag dang /_sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed ces rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa rnams so/_/'di la sngags kyi dam pa ni/_/pha rol gnon pa ston par
[\[32b.4\]]byed/_/ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'dis kyang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig ston pa tsam gyis ni/_ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyi stobs 'phrog pa'o/_/rig sngags las ni 'da' ba'i 'khor/_/kun du chad pas bsdigs byas te/_/zhes pa ni phyag
[\[32b.5\]]mtshan dang sku mdog ston pa ni/_ded dpon dag ni nyi shu brgyad/_/re re la yang stong phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu'o/_/'di dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/_dkar po dmar po ser po dang /_/ljang gu dang ni mthing ga dang /_/la la dkar ser dmar ser dang /_/la la ser nag ljang nag dang /_/
[\[32b.6\]]mgo bo ser po mjug ma nag_/smad dkar stod gnag khra bo'i gzugs/_/sna tshogs gzugs te phyed gzugs so/_/lag na rdo rje 'khor lo thogs/_/gtun shing dang ni rtse gsum mo/_/la la ral gri lag na thogs/_/gtor ma rwa dang mdung thung thogs/_/'phang mdung dang ni nar
[\[32b.7\]]tsa dang /_/la la dbyug pa thogs pa dang /_/rtse gcig dang ni mdung rings thogs/_/mdung dang mda' gzhu lcags kyu dang /_/la la mda' rings ga ge dang /_/cha lang dang ni rol mo'i tshogs/_/pi wang gling bu glu len cing /_/gnod sbyin pho mo glu len cing /_/yan lag lnga dang ldan pa yis/_/_
[\[33a\]]

[\[37a.1\]]gangs can rdzogs pa dang /_/zhes bya ba ni de rnams la yang de'i sder bcas shing /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu ba'o/_/tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang /_/mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang /_/zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don

[\[37a.4\]]ba ni 'byung po sde tshan de dang ldan pa/_ral gri bzhin du rno ba'o/_/'brog gnas dang ni yid bzangs dang /_/khab rna dang ni ri sul kha/_/zhes bya ba ni sde bo che nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_de rnams yang gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/_/lnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzangs dag_/
[\[37a.5\]]sde dang dpung dang bzhon par bcas/_/zhes bya ba ni stobs dang ldan pa sde bo cher grags pa'o/_/lha dang klu dang dri za dang /_/gnod sbyin 'byung po lha ma yin/_/zhes bya ba ni gdon rigs mi gcig pa lha'i gdon la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o/_/nyin gsum pa yi smyo byed dang /_/de
[\[37a.6\]]bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang /_/zhes bya ba ni nad sna tshogs gtong zhing smyo bar byed pa rnams yin te/_de rnams yang gzhan mi thub pa stobs dang ldan pa'o/_/'jig rten 'tshe ba gang yin pa/_/gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
[\[37a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis rgyu ba/_/sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/_/phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nas su/_/bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams la/_ye shes lnga'i zhags pas bcings
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]pa'o/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/_/thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad smras/_/zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar/_gus bar byas nas zhus pa'o/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/
[\[37b.2\]]zhes bya ba ni bdud bzhi 'joms pa la dpa' ba/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu pos sku la brgyan pa/_sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba/_snying rje dang byams pas khyab pa/_thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la
[\[37b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bya ba ni 'byung po de rnams kyis zhabs la gus par phyag 'tshal te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la/_chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o/_/de dag gi ni mdun rgyug pa/_/'byung po gnod sbyin lus po che/_/zhes bya ba ni che ba ri rab dang mnyam pa/_chung
[\[37b.4\]]ba ba spu'i rtsa mo tsam/_de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams rgyu ba'o/_/lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa/_/rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig pa/_/zhes bya ba ni mda' dang gzhu dang ral gri mdung rnams thogs pa/_stong tsho gcig gi rkang pa yod pa/_rkang gcig ni gnyis sbrel nas rgyu ba'o/_/rkang
[\[37b.5\]]bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang /_/rkang pa bsgreng la spyi'u tshugs dang /_/zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i 'byung po yang spyi bo'i gtsug gis 'gro zhing /_sems can rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/_/de bzhin du rkang bzhi rkang gnyis kyang 'jigs par byed pa'o/_/lus mang mgo bo gcig pa dang /_/lus
[\[37b.6\]]gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang /_/zhes bya ba ni gzugs che zhing 'jigs su rung ba bzhin mi sdug ba rnams so/_/mig mang po la lus phyed dang /_/mig gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang /_/zhes bya ba ni rkang gcig lag gcig lus su snang zhing /_/lus de la mig mang po yod pa ste/_'byung po
[\[37b.7\]]gzhan yang lto ba ri bo lta bur gnas pa/_mang po bsdebs pa mig gcig tu snang ba'o/_/bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/_/lag pa bsgreng la mgo btud dang /_/zhes bya ba ni gzugs mi'i gzugs la mgo bo sna tshogs su snang ba/_rkang pa dang lag pa sgreng bar byed pa'o/_/mtshon cha'i so dang
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]mtshon cha'i lag_/mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni de kun gyi yan lag dang ral gri dang /_mda' gzhu dang mdung la sogs par snang ba'o/_/zangs kyi skra dang zangs kyi so/_/zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag_/ces bya ba ni shin tu dmar ba 'jigs su rung
[\[38a.2\]]ba ste/_mtshon cha bzhin du snang ba'o/_/zangs kyi tho ba rkang pa dang /_/zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha/_/zhes bya ba ni mtshon cha mi 'jigs pa 'dzin pa/_rkang pa yang tho ba'i tshul du gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du kha la sogs pa yang zangs kyi skra bzhin du snang ba'o/_/rkang lag kun du 'bar ba
[\[38a.3\]]dang /_/mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni me bzhin du 'bar te/_des kyang mi la zhe sdang la sogs pa 'bar bar byed pa'o/_/sgur zhar lba ba gsum yod pa/_/mig mi sdug la kha glal ba/_/zhes bya ba ni bong thung zhing lus po sgur te/_de'i ske la sba ba gsum yod pa/_
[\[38a.4\]]lus po zha zhing kha gdangs pa/_mchu sngon por sang ba 'jigs pa'o/_/chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni/_/gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po/_/zhes bya ba ni mi'i lus la mgo brnyan du yod pa/_kha gdangs shing mi sdug pa'o/_/mchu 'phyang po dang so yon po/_/rab tu sdug pa'i khro gnyer
[\[38a.5\]]can/_/zhes bya ba ni gdong pa yo ba/_de bzhin du mchu dang so yo ba'o/_/khro bar gnas shing sems can la 'jigs par byed pa'o/_/gsus po che dang bum sna po/_/rna 'phyangs po dang rna ba med/_/ces bya ba ni gsus pa ri rab tsam snang ba/_rna ba gos su gon pa/_rna ba bcad
[\[38a.6\]]pa'i 'byung po rnams so/_/lag ring dang ni rna ba ring /_/sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring /_/zhes bya ba ni lag pa brkyang bas dpag tshad brgyar slebs te/_snas lus khebs te glang po che'i sna dang 'dra ba/_de bzhin sor mo yang ring ba'o/_/lus skams lus ni ring ba dang /_/skra ring rab tu
[\[38a.7\]]brgyan pa dang /_/zhes bya ba ni shin tu nag pa/_shing lpags skams pa dang 'dra ba/_/ring ba ni ring ba pas kyang ches ring ba lus rnams kyang skra ring bas brgyan pa'o/_/rkang pa mid pa phra ba dang /_/dri nga ba dang bum lto po/_/zhes bya ba ni yan lag gi tshigs rdog por yod pa/_rkang
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]pa phra bas te/_dri mi zhim pa mnam pa/_gsus pa ri bo tsam yod pa'o/_/yan lag chu srin 'dra ba dang /_/gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto/_/zhes bya ba ni lag pa dang rkang pa yang chu srin 'dra ste/_gzugs ring ba/_rked pa nyag pa/_nag por snang ba'o/_/gnam lto ba dang sna bo
[\[38b.2\]]che/_/gyen du brdzes skra rab tu dmar/_/zhes bya ba ni sna yar 'khyil pa glang po che'i sna 'dra ba/_khab kyi rtse mo dang 'dra ba'i skra dmar zhing 'bar ba'o/_/mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po/_/rked pa sgur po bum lto bo/_/zhes bya ba ni 'byung po la la ni gzhu bzhin du ske sgur bas te/_de bzhin du
[\[38b.3\]]yan lag dang lus po rnams kyang sgur ba'o/_/ri rab rtse mo bsgul nas su/_/me mdag gi ni char pa 'bebs/_/zhes bya ba ni gzi brjid dang /_stobs dang ldan zhing /_/ri rab dang sa g.yo bar byed pa ma rungs pa'i char 'bebs pa'o/_/ljon shing ri dang rdo ba dang /_/sprin gyi tshogs kyi
[\[38b.4\]]mdog 'dra ba/_/zhes bya ba ni la la gzugs bzang bar gnas pa/_gzhan rnams yang bzhin mi sdug pa'o/_/dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang /_/grul bum rnga bran rnams kyi sgra/_/zhes bya ba ni sgra dang rol mo la dga' ba gar sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o/_/'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin/_/ming
[\[38b.5\]]po che la bong bu'i sgra/_/zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gling bzhir thos pa'i sgra/_sgra des sems can 'jigs pa'o/_/nag po sngon po ser po dang /_/dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang /_/zhes bya ba ni bzhin mi sdug pa gzugs sna tshogs su snang ba/_bskal ba'i me'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i 'od
[\[38b.6\]]zer snang ba'o/_/khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i skra/_/dmar po'i khrag gis bskus pa rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni shin tu rno ba lus dang mgo rnams la khyab pa/_kha yang khrag gis bskus pa'o/_/mi ro dag ni khyer nas su/_/za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug_/ces bya ba ni mi rnams la 'tshe bar byed
[\[38b.7\]]cing srog 'phrog pa rnams yin te/_glags tshol zhing 'phrang kha bsgugs pa rnams yin no/_/so rnon lag pa dmar po dang /_/mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang /_/zhes bya ba ni mche ba ring ba mtshon 'dra ba ste/_sems can rnams kyi lag pa dmar por snang ba/_khrag 'thung ba la dga' ba'o/_/
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang /_/mkhal snying dang nang grol gyis/_/zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pas/_sha dang khrag la dga' ba dang /_/don snying lnga la dga' ba'o/_/snyim pa shin tu bkang ba dang /_byis pa dag ni za bzhin du/_/zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi
[\[39a.2\]]ni srog 'phrogs nas don snying rnam pa lnga phyung nas za bar byed pa'o/_/mer mer po dang srog chags kyi/_/rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog_/ces bya ba ni byang chub sems chags su mi ster bar za ba/_ma'i mngal nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o/_/keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su/_/skye bo
[\[39a.3\]]mang po skrag par byed/_/ces bya ba ni pags pa dang sha med pa dang rus par snang ste/_de lta bu'i gzugs kyis kyang 'tshe bar byed pa'o/_/khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yi/_/mi yi pags pa thogs nas su/_/zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams kyi khrag 'jib cing /_mi yi pags pa gon
[\[39a.4\]]pa'o/_/mi bzad dug gis kun bskus te/_/phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyug_/ces bya ba ni bsam pa dang /_mthong ba dang reg pa dang /_mche ba'i dug rnams kyis bskus pa/_stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyug pa'o/_/grong khyer rnams kyi sgo rnams dang /_/khyim
[\[39a.5\]]nas khyim du rnam par 'thor/_/zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la glags tshol ba/_grong dang grong khyer grong rdal du rgyu ba'o/_/rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed/_/ces bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyi mdze dang phol mig la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya
[\[39a.6\]]rtsa bzhi gtong ba'i bdag po'o/_/de ltar de na rgyal po yi/_/gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'byung po'i gdon de rnams 'dul ba'o/_/lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang /_/rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams/_/zhes bya ba ni
[\[39a.7\]]stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyis/_'byung po rnams rang dbang med par bkug pa'o/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la dpa' ba'o/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang pos sku la brgyan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du byed pa'o/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gus par phyag 'tshal te/_stong gsum gyi
[\[39b.2\]]chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o/_/grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang /_/pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba dang /_/zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus tshod ni snga dro shar gyi phyogs nas rgyu/_nyi ma phyed na lho nas rgyu/_nyi ma smyur nas nub kyi phyogs su rgyu/_nyi ma smyur nas ma nub bar du byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/_
[\[39b.3\]]nyi ma nub nas sa sros bar du shar lho mtshams su rgyu/_srod 'khor nam phyed bar du srin po'i phyogs nas rgyu/_nam phyed skya rings tshun chad nub byang phyogs nas rgyu/_skya rings shar nas nam langs tshun chad byang shar mtshams nas rgyu/_de dag dus rgyu ba ni/_mchod phyir lhags kyang 'tshe
[\[39b.4\]]ba mod/_/tshes grangs dag la rgyu ba rnams/_/de dag mi la 'tshe bar byed/_/tshes gcig dang ni bcu gcig la shar gyi phyogs nas chu tshod bzhi'i bar du rgyu/_tshes gnyis dang bcu gsum la lho'i phyogs nas chu tshod brgyad rgyu/_tshes gsum dang bcu gnyis la chu tshod bcu'i bar du nub
[\[39b.5\]]kyi phyogs nas rgyu/_srod 'khor tsam tshes bzhi dang bcu bzhi la nam phyed nas chu tshod drug byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/_tshes lnga dang bcu drug la ni nyi ma dros nas shar lho mtshams nas chu tshod bdun rgyu'o/_/tshes drug dang dgu la chu tshod sum cu tham pa lho nub mtshams nas snga dro nas rgyu'o/_/
[\[39b.6\]]tshes bdun dang bcu tham pa'i dus su nub byang mtshams nas snga dro nas chu tshod bco lnga la rgyu'o/_/tshes brgyad dang gnam stong la byang shar nas snga dro nas chu tshod bcu gnyis bar du rgyu'o/_/de dag ni 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'o/_/gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa/_/snying rje med cing
[\[39b.7\]]khrag 'thung ba/_/zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa ste/_'byung po de rnams sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o/_lus chen 'jigs pa chen po ste/_/stobs po che la sgra yang che/_/zhes bya ba ni lus ni ra rab dang mnyam pa/_stobs kyis ni ri rab bsgul ba/_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]skad kyang drag po'i tshul du snang ba'o/_/mgrin bcu po la mig stong po/_/gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni mgo re re la mig brgya brgya yod pa ste/_mig de yang dmar por snang zhing 'jigs su rung ba'o/_/'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/_/lag na
[\[40a.2\]]mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs/_/zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin ma rungs pa mang por snang zhing /_ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha mang po thogs pa'o/_/sbrul gyi pags pa thogs pa dang /_/lag bzhi lag na sgron me thogs/_/zhes bya ba ni dug sbrul gyi pags pa gon pa/_mi gsal
[\[40a.3\]]ba gsal bar byed pa kha nas me 'bar zhing 'jigs par byed pa'o/_/lag na mtshon dang dbyig pa thogs/_/rdo rje'i mdung rtse lag na thogs/_/zhes bya ba ni 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang /_lag na mtshon sna tshogs pa thogs shing 'jigs su rung ba'o/_/rab tu drag pa'i dmag
[\[40a.4\]]brgal nas/_/phyogs bcu kun du skrag par byed/_/ces bya ba ni dpung mang po dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu dag tu 'khod pa ste/_de dag gis kyang sems can rnams la 'jigs pa dang skrag par byed pa'o/_/sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/_/gsang ba po ni dad kun yang /_/zhes
[\[40a.5\]]bya ba ni sems can rnams la sdang ba/_rgya cher gnod pa skyel ba'o/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu/_/skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi mi rnams la 'byung po de rnams kyis 'tshe bar byas pa'o/_/sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la/_/rnam par
[\[40a.6\]]'khrul zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs/_/zhes bya ba ni mi rnams kyi srog gcod cing sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o/_/seng ge dang ni stag dang rta/_/ma he ba glang bong bu rnga/_/zhes bya ba ni gzugs mi gcig pa byol song rnams kyi gzugs su sprul pa'o/_/glang po che yi gzugs 'dra
[\[40a.7\]]dang /_/dom dang gzig dang spyang ki dang /_/zhes bya ba ni de dang der ldan pa'i gzugs su snang zhing /_sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/_/khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang /_/byi la byi ba sbre'u'i gzugs/_/zhes bya ba ni gnod pa skyel ba'i dus su gcan gzan gyi gzugs
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]su sprul pa'o/_/bse dang phag dang sre mong dang /_/nya dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs/_/zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyang sna tshogs su snang ba/_rmi lam yang de bzhin du snang ba'o/_/kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs/_/khwa dang 'ug pa khu byug dang /_/zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i gzugs su snang
[\[40b.2\]]zhing gnod pa cher skyel ba'o/_/bya rgod khra dang nya mid bcas/_/rma bya ngang pa thi ba dang /_/zhes bya ba ni de'i gzugs su ston cing /_skad mi gcig pa mang po 'don pa'o/_/khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang /_/kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su/_/zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba
[\[40b.3\]]ma rungs pa rnams yin te/_ltas dang rmi lam ngan par byed pa'o/_/gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong /_/'dab bzangs bya yi tshul gyis kyang /_/zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs ston pa/_sems can rnams la skrag par byed pa'o/_/skye bo mang po skrag byed cing /_/zhes bya
[\[40b.4\]]ba ni skyes pa bud med byis pa rnams la skrag par byed pa'o/_/kha cig mi yi mgo can la/_/lus ni bya gag bong du 'dra/_/zhes bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po rnams kyang /_mi'i mgo can la byol song gi lus so/_/kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe/_/lus dang bral ba nyid du
[\[40b.5\]]snang /_/zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs mtshon gyis 'tshe zhing /_khrag khrug la dga' ba'o/_/rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos/_/rgyu ma'i phreng bas rab tu dkris/_/zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing sems 'khrugs par byed pa ste/_yan lag mi'i rgyu ma'i phreng
[\[40b.6\]]bas brgyan pa'o/_/rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing /_/srog chags rnams la gnod par byed/_/ces bya ba ni 'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po de dag kyang snying rje dang bral ba'o/_/mi bzad pa yi dbugs 'byin cing /_/skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed/_/ces bya ba ni ske ba che
[\[40b.7\]]zhing skad che ba ste/_sgra des sems can rnams skrag pa'o/_/srog chags rgyud rnams ji snyed par/_/sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang /_/zhes bya ba ni nya la sogs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs su snang zhing /_gzugs mi gcig pa mang po snang ba'o/_/kha cig dag ni ri yang thogs/_/
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]la la ral gri 'khor lo thogs/_/zhes bya ba ni stobs dang ldan zhing ri rab theg par nus pa/_mtshon rnon pos 'tshe bar byed pa'o/_/grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te/_/dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha drag pa/_/zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams sde chen por gnas shing
[\[41a.2\]]sems can rnams la chad pa chen po gcod pa'o/_/mig chung ba la bzhin mi sdug_/srin po'i so ni rno ba dang /_/zhes bya ba ni bzhin mi sdug pa kha dang so rnams yo ba'o/_/sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang /_/lce bcad gdong ni gnyer ma can/_/zhes bya ba ni gzugs ngan par snang zhing /_dbang
[\[41a.3\]]po rnams ma tshang ba'o/_/rkang lag dag ni gtubs pa dang /_/mgo bo bcad pa'i srin po rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni mgo bo med par brang nas gdong pa snang bas te/_tshigs rnams la yang gdong pa snang ba'o/_/skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed/_/sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog_/
[\[41a.4\]]ces bya ba ni sems can rnams la glags tshol zhing /_sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sems can gyi dpal 'phrog pa'o/_/mi yi lus rnams dag la ni/_/rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang /_/zhes bya ba ni mi'i lus la zhugs nas mi dga' ba'i sems dang /_lceb pa'i sems
[\[41a.5\]]dang ldan par byed pa'o/_/spu yi bar dang nad rnams dang /_/de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su/_/zhes bya ba ni ba spu'i bar du 'dzin cing /_rma med pa rma yod par byas te/_rma'i nang rul bar byas nas/_phyi subs nas nang na tsha chen po dang ldan par byed do/_/lhags pa de dag thams cad
[\[41a.6\]]kyang /_/rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs/_/zhes bya ba ni rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bcings pa'o/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/zhes bya ba ni de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po
[\[41a.7\]]rnams kyis kyang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos srid du mdzad cing /_stong gsum gyi chos
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]kyi rgyal por snang ba'o/_/ri yi rgyal po ri rab dang /_/zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod yon lnga la spyod pa bzhin/_'byung po rnams kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas spyod do/_/ji ltar spyod ce na/_gzugs mthong bas mdangs 'phrog pa dang /_sgra snyan po thos nas 'dzin pa dang /_dri zhim po tshor nas 'dzin pa

[\[59a.5\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa nyan thos dang /_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du 'gro ba lags/_gzhon nu 'od zer skyes dgra bcom pa yang dag par byung bas
[\[59a.6\]]gshegs par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i stan las langs te/_gtsug lag khang nas phyir gshegs so/_/de bzhin du dgra bcom pa rnams kyang gshegs so/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_
[\[59a.7\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_rgyal chen gyi lha rnams dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang lha'i rol mos bcom ldan 'das la sngun du bsu ste/_lha rdzas kyi dri bzang po dang /_me tog gi char phab bo/_/de nas rgyal po chen po gzugs can snying pos thos
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]nas rgyal po dang rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa yang gshegs so/_/de'i rting la gcer bu'i mtshan ma'am tshong dpon gyi 'khor ram/_ro de gla la gshegs so/_/de bzhin du rgyal po'i khab kyi skye dgu 'am skye dgu'i bdag po la sogs pa dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du gshegs so/_/
[\[59b.2\]]bsil ba'i tshal du slebs nas/_phyogs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos la sogs pa bzhugs so/_/phyogs gcig tu gcer bu dang mu stegs pa bsdad do/_/de nas ro bsregs pa'i sa nas skad byung ngo /_/skad byung ba dang pad+ma skyes so/_/pad+ma'i steng na gzhon nu 'od
[\[59b.3\]]zer skyes zhes bya ba skyes so/_/shin tu skye legs pa dgra bcom pa'i cha byang dang ldan pa de me'i nang du de lta bu skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon la smras pa/_kye tshong dpon khyod kyi bu 'di lags so zhes smras so/_/tshong dpon gyis gcer bu la kha
[\[59b.4\]]bltas nas langs dogs byed do/_/de nas gcer bus tshong dpon la smras so/_/kye tshong dpon me'i nang du gang yang /_shi nas me la bsregs pa la/_/khyod kyi bu ni gang las skyes/_/me yi nang du 'gro na ni/_/khyod ni nges par tshig par 'gyur/_/zhes brjod pas 'gro ma nus so/_/de nas
[\[59b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal to/_/kye rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long la spyon cig ces brjod pa dang /_rgyal po chen pos blangs nas/_me'i nang nas khyer nas 'ongs so/_/me de yang shin tu bsil ba tsha ba'i dngos po med do/_/yang
[\[59b.6\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis blangs nas/_byin gyis brlabs nas/_dgra bcom pa gzhon nu 'od zer skyes zhes bya bar mtshan btags so/_/de nas gzugs can snying pos blangs te/_lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pas kyang bltas so/_/ngo mtshar che'o/_/mi
[\[59b.7\]]rnams kyis kyang ngo mtshar che'o zhes ltad mo bltas so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pas/_lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char phab bo/_/lha'i rol mos mchod pa byas so/_/mu stegs gcer bu'i tshan pa de pham mo/_/bdud pham mo/_/'od
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]zer gyi dra ba kun du 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i nges tshig go/_/mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na zhes bya ba ni/_mtshan mo ni dpe yin te/_de bzhin du mtshan mo'i me ni shin tu gsal bas mtshan mo zhes bya ba'o/_/ro bo'i spo la me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba dang 'dra zhing zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[60a.2\]]dper na mi zhig gis ri bo chen po la 'bar ba mthong bzhin du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gser gyi ri bo nas gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/_gser zhes bya ba ni/_yon tan dang ldan pa'o/_/ri bo chen po ltar zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'o/_/lha ma me lhan ne zhes bya ba ni 'od zer
[\[60a.3\]]sna tshogs so/_/rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni/_mun nag gi nang nas me 'bar ba mthong ba bzhin du mthong ngo /_/gshegs pa ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su'o/_/mthong ba ni lits+tsha bI rnams kyis so/_/mthong ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni gus pa'i sems kyis
[\[60a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas sems de 'khril bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sems dad par gyur pa de dag ces bya
[\[60a.5\]]ba ni grong khyer yangs pa can gyi mi rnams so/_/byi dor byed pa zhes bya ba ni dad pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por/_lam gang nas gshegs pa'i lam de 'phyag cing chag chag 'debs zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas
[\[60a.6\]]gshegs pa'i lam la gzhan rnams kyis kyang tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri zhim po'i chus sa gzhi rnam par dag par byas so/_/byi dor legs byas me tog 'thor/_/zhes bya ba ni sa gzhi mthon dman med par byas la me tog sna tshogs kyis sil mar bkram la me tog phreng ba'i dra
[\[60a.7\]]bas brgyan pa'o/_/dar gyi lda ldi dang /_dril bu dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te zhes bya ba ni/_grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhir yang bar snang gi phyogs su de rnams 'phyar ba'o/_/bdug spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs nas zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]grong khyer gyi phyogs dang mtshams su bdug spos sna tshogs kyi bog phor gzhag pa dang bum pa gang ba bzhag pa'o/_/ga la ba der song ste ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dbus su'o/_/zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/_grong
[\[60b.2\]]khyer yangs pa can gyi mi rnams dang lits+tsha bI rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal gyi rting la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i ri mo can me tog pad+ma'i snying po ltar 'jam pa zhes bya ba ni lits+tsha bI'i mgo la reg
[\[60b.3\]]ba'o/_/sngon legs par spyad pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni skyes bu'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa'o/_/gzhon sha chags shing zhes bya ba ni lo bcu gnyis pa'i sha lta bu'o/_/'jam pa ni lus ngag yid gsum 'jam
[\[60b.4\]]pos nyi ma'i 'od zer bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni nyi ma bdun gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/_/'od zer brgya phrag mang po kun du 'phro ba zhes bya ba ni/_mdzod spu'am ba spu'i bu ga'am lte ba'i gnas sam dbu'i gtsug tor ram ljags sam sna'i bu ga'am/_snyan nam
[\[60b.5\]]spyan gyi sgo nas sems can gyi don la 'phro ba'o/_/dri ma med pa'i phyag gis zhes bya ba ni/_nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'o/_/lits+tsha bI rnams kyi mgo la byugs te zhes bya ba ni bram ze chen pos gsol ba btab pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phyag spyi bor bzhag nas
[\[60b.6\]]byin gyis brlabs pa'o/_/rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bya ba ni rjes su dran pa drug go/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni lits+tsha bI byin gyis brlabs zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i nang du gshegs pa ni/_grong khyer gyi dbus su nam gyi gung thun la zhes
[\[60b.7\]]bya ba ni yi dgas rgyu ba'i dus su'o/_/sgo skyes kyi gzhi zhabs kyis mnan nas zhes bya ba ni/_dbang po'i phur pa la zhabs yang dag par bzhag pa'o/_/phyogs bzhir gzigs te zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'o/_/phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas zhes
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bya ba ni/_sngon du song ba ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa'o/_/na bza' bla gos gsol te zhes bya ba ni/_mdzes pa'i chos gos phrag la gzar nas zhes bya ba yin no/_/bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log
[\[61a.2\]]pa'o/_/phyi ma'i dus na zhes bya ba ni/_sku mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/dge slong ma la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/_bstan pa srung dgos pa'i dus su ste bkur sti byed pa'o/_/gang su yang rung ba dag ces bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' lcang lo can rnams kyis bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[61a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa byed pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa rnams kyi/_sku gzugs dang gdung dang ring bsrel lta bu'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa gdon thams cad
[\[61a.4\]]las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni/_stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bdud bzhi po pham par byed pa/_bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa yang dag par 'grub pa/_sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par byed ma/_ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams rlag par byed ma/_
[\[61a.5\]]chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi skur snang ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya 'di zhes bya ba ni/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di yang 'das pa'i
[\[61a.6\]]sangs rgyas 'od srungs la sogs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bsrung zhing /_phyag rgya'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la sogs pa yin no/_/de ltar yang shAkya thub pa la sogs pas bsrung zhing phyag rgya'i rgyas
[\[61a.7\]]btab pa'o/_/'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing ston pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang kha ton du sngags dang mdo 'don pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de dag la zhes bya ba ni/_rgya cher chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]gus par 'di las rgya cher spel nas bla mar byas/_mchod par byas pa'o/_/yams kyi nad dang 'jigs pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_'ching ba dang /_kha mchu dang /_shags dang /_tha na phra ma dang sdig pa mi dge ba sdug bsngal ba'i
[\[61b.2\]]las kyis mi tshugs shing 'tshe bar byed pa thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni greng yangs pa can gyi dbus su 'khor gyi nang du bka' stsal pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/_mnyam pa nyid du khyab pa'i
[\[61b.3\]]sangs rgyas la/_'jig rten gyi mes pos zhus pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/_sku gsung thugs btsun pa dka' thub mdzad pa/_bdud rnams bcom zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug nyon mongs pa lnga las 'das pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo stong chen mo rab tu
[\[61b.4\]]'joms ma zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ring bsrel lta bu phyag rgya bzhi'i ngo bo'i gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba ni bar chod med pa bdud rnams kyis mi tshugs pa ste/_'di'i lam nas thar pa thob pa/_dmigs pa
[\[61b.5\]]med pa'i ye shes stong pa nyid du snang ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya de gang lags zhes bya ba ni/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar yod
[\[61b.6\]]pas gsungs pa gsang sngags kyi tshig zhus pa'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/_mtshan
[\[61b.7\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa sprul pa'i skus bka' stsal pa'o/_/tshangs pa de'i phyir khyod legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do zhes bya ba ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]par byed pa'i gsang sngags sangs rgyas kyis sems can gyi don la bka' stsal pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas zhes bya ba ni/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang gus par/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab
[\[62a.2\]]pa'o/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_'khor rnam bzhi dang tshangs pas dbu mdzad pa mi dang mi ma yin pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms pa'o/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/_de
[\[62a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang mtshan ma ston te mtshan ma ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do/_/de'i mtshon cha ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so/_/sku mdog ni dkar po zhal bzhi pa g.yas zhal sngon po ltag pa'i zhal dmar ser g.yon ljang gu spyan gsum dang
[\[62a.4\]]ldan pa'o/_/dbu la rigs lngas brgyan pa'o/_/phyag brgyad pa dang /_g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri_/rdo rje dang rtse gsum mo/_/g.yon gyi phyag na 'dzin pa ni bum pa'i steng na rdo rje dang rin po che dang zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu'o/_/pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje skyil krung mdzad pa/_sku
[\[62a.5\]]me 'od kyi dkyil na bzhugs pa'o/_/rdo rje rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so/_/de bzhin du stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma rtsa ba'i sngags so/_/s+yad ya the dan a tsa li la sogs pa'o/_/stong chen mo rtsa ba'i sngags de la/_'di skad ces bya ste/_lus su rtogs pa dang
[\[62a.6\]]dran pa dang zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni/_thabs dang shes rab ste lha'i gzugs su bsgom pa ni thabs so/_/rig sngags stong pa nyid bsgom pa ni shes rab ste/_des na thabs shes rab zung du 'brel
[\[62a.7\]]pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ste stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/_zhi ba'i rnam pa
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]dang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/_de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul
[\[62b.2\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dpyod pa'i
[\[62b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba ni/_sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang /_skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang /_dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa
[\[62b.4\]]rnams skyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni/_lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni/_yan lag
[\[62b.5\]]'dus pa sna tshogs kyi lus gzung 'dzin la sogs pa stong zhing mi dmigs pa bsgom pa'o/_/tshor ba ni phyin yang med nang na yang med gnyis ka med par mi dmigs pa bsgom pa'o/_/sems ni ming tsam ste mi dmigs pa bsgom pa'o/_/chos ni chos la mi dmigs pa bsgom
[\[62b.6\]]pa'o/_/de ni theg pa chen po'i dbang du byas pa'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po nas yan lag lnga ste/_rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis nyon mongs pa'i yan lag go/_/dga' ba dang bde ba gnyis phan pa'i yan lag go/_/sems rtse gcig pa gnyis
[\[62b.7\]]ka'i yan lag go/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa ni yan lag kun la bsdus nas bzhir bshad do/_/nad rab tu dang ba gnyen po'i yan lag go/_/tshor ba yid dga' ba dang bde ba phan yon gyi yan lag_/sems rtse gcig pa gnyis ka gnas kyi yan lag go/_/bsam gtan
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]gsum pa la yan lag lnga ste/_btang snyoms dran pa shes bzhin gsum gnyen po'o/_/tshor ba bde ba phan yon gyi'o/_/sems rtse gcig pa gnyis ka gnas kyi yan lag go/_/bzhi pa na yang yan lag lnga ste bzhir bshad do/_/btang snyoms yongs
[\[63a.2\]]su dag pa dang /_dran pa yongs su dag pa dang /_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/shes bzhin yongs su dag pa ni gnyen po'i tshor ba dang phan yon gyi yan lag go/_/sems rtse gcig pa ni gnyis ka'i gnas kyi yan lag go/_/'phags pa'i
[\[63a.3\]]bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba ni/_gang gi 'du byed thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba des sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'o/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong ba des kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs so/_/chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba des/_'gog pa
[\[63a.4\]]mngon du byas so/_/chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba des/_lam bsgoms so/_/dbang po lnga zhes bya ba ni/_dad pa'i dbang po ni/_las dang /_'bras bu dang /_bden pa dang /_dkon mchog rnams la mngon par yid ches pa ste dbang po ni 'di'o zhes mngon par
[\[63a.5\]]'dzin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni bya ba de la nges par 'jug pa'o/_/dran pa'i dbang po ni dran pa nyams pa med pa ste des ma rig pa'i skabs mi byed pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni sems rtse gcig pa ste des dbang byed pa'o/_/shes rab kyi dbang po ni blang
[\[63a.6\]]ba dang dor ba gnyis rnam par 'byed pa'o/_/stobs lnga zhes bya ba ni/_dad pa'i stobs la sogs pa bshad pa ni/_dbang po lnga nyid rab kyi mthar gyur pa la gzhag go/_/de dag kyang dad pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /_dran pa'i stobs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi
[\[63a.7\]]stobs dang /_shes rab kyi stobs zhes mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro/_/rjes su dran pa drug ces bya ba ni/_rten dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa/_yul tshad med pa bzhi rjes su dran pa/_shes bya bden pa gnyis rjes su dran pa/_thabs shes rab rjes su dran pa dang /_rgyu rigs
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]lnga'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa dang /_'bras bu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba ni/_chos rnam par 'byed pa byang chub kyi yan lag gis sa dang po la chos kyi dbyings skye ba med par rang gi mtshan nyid mngon sum du skyu ru ra lag mthil du bzhag
[\[63b.2\]]pa bzhin rtogs pa'o/_/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gis gang du chos rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rtogs pa ma brjed pa'o/_/brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la thogs pa med par 'jug pas sam dge ba gong nas
[\[63b.3\]]gong du 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni nyon mongs pa spong ba'i gzhi ste/_/de la lus shin tu sbyangs pa ni lus shing bal gyi 'dab ma ltar yang ba dang reg na bde ba la sogs pa'o/_/sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa ste/_

[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]gzi brjid kyis dug gis mi tshugs shing /_nges par bcom mo/_/dug med dug rnams 'joms byed pa/_/gsang sngags tshig rnams de lags so/_/zhes bya ba ni gsang sngags ni/_ha ri ke shi Ni la sogs pa'o/_/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i gsang sngags kyi
[\[86a.2\]]tshig gis dug gsum nges par 'joms pa'o/_/gsang sngags tshig rnams de lags so/_/zhes bya ba ni rig sngags ni gang zhe na/_zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog ljang gu spyan gsum pa/_sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/_cung zad khro mo g.yas na ral gri dang rma bya'i sgro 'dzin pa/_g.yan pa na rdo rje
[\[86a.3\]]dang sbrul 'dzin pa'o/_/rgyan thams cad ni sbrul dang bcas pa/_zhabs phyed skyil du bzhugs pa'o/_/nyi ma'i gdan gyi steng na mtha' yas dang /_'jog po mnan pa'o/_/'od nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/_rdo rje'i rigs ma stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'o/_/'bras dang rma dang
[\[86a.4\]]shu ba dang /_/g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang /_/lhog pa dang ni g.ya' ba ni/_/bdun pa lags te rab tu bcom/_/zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten nang gi dug gsum ma spangs pas phyi'i dug gsum pa de dag 'byung ste/_'dir yang gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di dag nges
[\[86a.5\]]par bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags kyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan no/_/de dag ni dug chen po zhes bya ba'o/_/zhe sdang gis ni mi la phrag dog la sogs pa byas te/_de dag kyang dug
[\[86a.6\]]chen po zhes bya'o/_/gti mug ni ma rig pa yin te/_de dag kyang dug chen po yin no/_/yang na sku'i dug_/gsung gi dug_/thugs kyi dug dang gsum mo/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'am/_/'jig rten gyi dug gsum mam/_rang gis rang dug btang ba'o/_/yang na ni
[\[86a.7\]]rang gis rang sel du btub ste/_'jig rten gyi dug gsum ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi sel lo/_/bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi mnga'/_/zhes bya ba ni rang gis rang gi dug bcom ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dug bcom pa'o/_/de bas na dug
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'o/_/sangs rgyas gzi brjid dug bcom mo/_/zhes bya ba ni dug ni gsum yin te/_'gro ba'i dug dang /_'dug pa'i dug dang /_byams pa'i dug dang gsum mo/_/'gro ba'i dug la bzhi ste/_tshor ba mthong ba/_reg pa khas blangs pa bzhi'o/_/'dug pa'i
[\[86b.2\]]dug nas las skyes pa ste/_sam ya 'bum sde'o/_/byed pa'i dug ni/_sbyor ba la sogs pa ste/_dper na kham phor gyi nang du mar dang sbrang rtsi mnyam par byas nas zhag bdun bzhag ste/_mchod rten gyi mdun du mchod par bya ba dang /_sbyin sreg bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba dang /_dus
[\[86b.3\]]khyad par du 'phags pa ni/_rig sngags bklag par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/_de dag gi tshul khrims dang ldan par bgyis la/_rig sngags gdon par bgyi'o/_/me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga dang ldan par bgyis la/_'byung po dag la yang gtor ma sbyin no/_/tshes brgyad
[\[86b.4\]]kyi tshe na ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i skyes bu dag ces bya ba ni/_rgyal po'i gzugs su byas nas mchod par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnams kyi mdun na de la sems bar zhes bya ba ni/_sngon du bshad pa bzhin du/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i mchod par bya'o/_/ming nas kyang 'don par
[\[86b.5\]]bgyid do zhes bya ba ni yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_spyan mi bzang dang /_rnam thos sras dang /_mchod pa yang dag par bya'o/_/tshes bcu bzhi'i tshe na rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid mdun na sems par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/_yang nas yang du mchod pa
[\[86b.6\]]la sogs pa bgyid do/_nad la sogs pa 'tshe ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'o/_/ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do/_/tshes bco lnga'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag nyid/_sems par bgyid cing ming nas kyang 'don par bgyid do zhes bya ba ni/_gang zag gang gis
[\[86b.7\]]de bzhin du byas par gyur na/_nad dang sdug bsngal gyis mi tshugs te/_dus dus su rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang 'khor bar 'gyur ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos zhes bya ba ni/_sems ma dad pa gang gis kyang /_'di la gus par byas na tshugs par yang mi
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di zhes bya ba ni/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas gdab pa'o/_/len pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_ston pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa de ni/_
[\[87a.2\]]srog chags 'byung po thams cad la snying brtse zhing /_phan par bgyid pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/_'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas lta ba dang /_gzhan yang 'di'i bslabs pas/_byams pa dang snying rjer ldan pas so/_/btsun pa
[\[87a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang de la zhes bya ba ni/_bslab pa'i gzhi bzung zhing /_sems can rnams kyi don byed pa rgyal po chen po dag la yang gus par byas na/_don 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gos dang zas dang /_mal cha dang stan dang na
[\[87a.4\]]ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams kyis/_mi brel bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin du byas par 'gyur na/_sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'gyur zhing /_nad rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sems can thams cad kyis kyang /_bsti stang bgyid bar 'gyur
[\[87a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni/_'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams kyang gus par byas pa'o/_/rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis kyang /_bla mar bgyi ba dang /_rim gror bgyi ba dang /_mchod par bgyid par 'gyur ba lags so zhes bya ba ni/_sngar bshad pa bzhin du de dag gis kyang lus
[\[87a.6\]]ngag yid kyis gus par byas pa'o/_/gzhan mu stegs can dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa can dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_mdza' ba dang /_mi mdza' ba dag gi nang du mchis kyang mchod par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/_mu stegs kyi rigs lta ba mi
[\[87a.7\]]gcig pa sum brgya drug cu yod kyang drug tu bsdus te/_drug po gnyis su bsdus pa'i lta ba rnams kyis kyang 'dir gong du bshad pa bzhin du gus par byas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa des gtsang mar bgyis te zhes bya ba ni/_yul 'dzam bu'i gling
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gi dbus su mi'i lus su skye ste/_rigs las 'phags pa rgyal po dang bram ze dang rje'u rigs su skye'o/_/lus gtsang ba dang /_gos dang rgyan dang mal cha dang /_stan dang yo byad khyad par can dang gtsang mar bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/_mi dge ba bcu spangs shing phun sum tshogs pa/_dkon
[\[87b.2\]]mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'o/_/yul ngan pa rnyed par mi bgyid yul ngan pa'i mdza' bo dang brten par mi bgyid/_/yul ngan pa na gnas pa la bsngags par mi bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/_mtha' 'khob tu ni mi skye zhing /_de dag gi mi rnams dang /_gnas pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur
[\[87b.3\]]ba'o/_/gang 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mdun du stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa'i mdo sde 'di dran par gyur na zhes bya ba ni/_rims nad dang /_yams nad dang de la sogs pa thams cad dang /_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_smyo 'bog la sogs pa thams cad las thar bar
[\[87b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/de la rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag nyid/_bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/_bzhi po de dag kyang stong chen mo la gus par byed pa ni mi nus so/_/'khor de dag gis kyang byed ma nus so/_/skyob pa dang sbed par byed par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/_gang gis gnod par byed
[\[87b.5\]]par 'gyur na yang mthong bar mi nus so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde 'di mthu che ba zhes bya ba ni/_dngos po med pa dngos po dang bral ba rang bzhin du dag pa/_nam mkha'i ngo bo bzhin du yin te/_brjod pa yang med brjod du yang
[\[87b.6\]]med do/_/gang gis rang gi khyim du mtshan gcig gam/_nyin gcig kyang rung yang dag par bsams na zhes bya ba ni/_'di'i gzhung bzhin du bsgom pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 'chang ba dang rgya cher 'phel ba'o/_/de la lo gcig bar du mi ma lags pas glags rnyed par mi
[\[87b.7\]]'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni/_yud tsam du gus par byas na yang /_'di skabs ma phyi gnyis la chad/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams so/_/'jig rten skyong dang zhes bya ba ni/_me lha dang /_srin po dang /_rlung lha dang /_dbang ldan dang /_gshin rje dang /_gnod
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]sbyin dang /_sa bdag rnams so/_/dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni/_u ma de ba lha yin te/_yab yum gnyis dang ngo /_/gnod sbyin ded dpon thams cad dang /_/zhes bya ba ni ded dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /_mthu bo che nyi shu rtsa brgyad do/_/de rnams
[\[88a.2\]]kyi ded dpon du gyur pa ni gsum yin te/_nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /_sa la rgyu ba dang /_sa 'og la rgyu ba gsum mo/_/nam mkha' la rgyu ba ni tshangs pa'o/_/sa la rgyu ba ni khyab 'jug chen po'o/_/sa 'og la rgyu ba ni dbang phyug chen po'o/_/'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa
[\[88a.3\]]yang /_/zhes bya ba ni 'phrog ma'i bu ni lnga brgya ste/_yab ni gnod sbyin pa ny+tsi ka'o/_/'phrog ma'i bu dang bcas pa la gnod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta bu yin te/_nyal nas rdul zhing skrag par bgyid/_/rnam pa sna tshogs sgra yang 'byin/_/tshig pa za zhing rdul bar byed/_/
[\[88a.4\]]rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs bstan pa/_/'khru bar byed cing skyug par byed pa de dag 'phrog ma'i bu'i mtshan nyid do/_/de dag gi cho ga ni bshad par bya'o/_/sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la sogs pa byas nas/_rig sngags ni bklag par bya'o/_/yas stags
[\[88a.5\]]ni shal nya sha bkal nas/_chan dang chang dang khur ba la sogs pa gtor ma la bzhag nas/_chang bu gsum yang mar gyis byugs la ha ri te zhes bya ba'i ming bton la gtang ngo /_/de nas byis pa khye'u mang po bos la/_'bru chan nam sran ma'i chan btsos la/_byis pa
[\[88a.6\]]la ston mo bya'o/_/de ltar byas na the tshom med do/_/thal mo dag ni rab sbyar nas/_/zhes bya ba ni de dag rnams kyis thal mo sbyar nas/_sangs rgyas kyi mdun du'o/_/sgra skad gcig tu 'di skad gsol/_/zhes bya ba ni de dag rnams kyis skad gcig tu byas nas/_bcom
[\[88a.7\]]ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba'o/_/nyi ma stong ltar gsal ba'i 'od/_/ces bya ba ni stong chen po rab tu 'joms ma'i gzi brjid dang /_mthu dang stobs de bzhin du yin no/_/zla ba nya ltar 'od gsal ba/_/zhes bya ba ni zla ba nya ba bzhin du 'od gsal ba de bzhin du/_
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]stong chen mo rab tu 'joms mas kyang /_sems can thams cad la 'od gsal ba'o/_/lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bgegs rnams rjes gcod pa la drag po ste/_yang na stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi
[\[88b.2\]]khams kyi sems can thams cad skyob pa la drag pa'o/_/khyod dang 'dra ba yang ma mchis/_/zhes bya ba ni sngon du yang ma byung ste/_phyi nas kyang 'ong ba ma yin no/_/legs sam legs par sbyar na ni/_/zhes bya ba ni 'di la dad pas 'dzin pa rnams la bkra shis pa'i rgyu yin
[\[88b.3\]]no/_/gnod sbyin srin po rnams 'joms pa/_/zhes bya ba ni sems can la gnod pa thams cad 'joms pa'o/_/rgyal srid thar bgyid ces bgyi ba/_/zhes bya ba ni/_de la gus par byed pa thams cad la kho'i rgyal srid las thar ba'o/_/rig sngags rgyal srid rab sbyor ba/_/zhes
[\[88b.4\]]bya ba ni de dag ni rtse mo ste/_bsrung ba gang gis kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'o/_/de gang zhe na/_'khor bar gnas med mya ngan 'das med do/_/gnyis ka med cing sdug bsngal 'joms byed pa/_/rig sngags rgyal mo drag ma yin/_/stong chen gyi ni 'jig rten na/_/srung ba'i
[\[88b.5\]]mdo sde dam pa lags/_/zhes bya ba ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis yang dag par gsungs pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams khyab pa/_'di srung ba dang skyob pa byed pa la'o/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/_/phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la/_/zhes
[\[88b.6\]]bya ba ni skyes bu rnams kyi dam pa stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/_chos spyod pa la 'dud pa'o/_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal nas/_/zhes bya ba ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de nyid du ni mi snang gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni de nyid ni de kho na
[\[88b.7\]]nyid do/_/myong 'gyur snang ni ming gi gtso bo ste/_de dag kyang mi'i nang nas byung ba'o/_/yon tan gyi gnas skabs te bco lnga ba'o//_//de nas zhes bya ba ni/_phan yon bshad pa'i de nas so/_/bcom ldan 'das nub ka'i dus kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni/_rang gi
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'khor dge slong la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa'o/_/nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba ni/_'dul ba la sogs pa bka' yin te/_gsang ba la gnas bka' stsal ba'o/_/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba zhes bya ba ni/_dge slong lnga bcu
[\[89a.2\]]la sogs pa'o/_/dge slong dag stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde longs shig ces bya ba ni/_dad pa skyed la gus par gyis shig ces bya'o/_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/ston cig_/kun chub par gyis shig ces bya ba ni/_gus par gzhan rnams kyis kyang rgya cher 'phel
[\[89a.3\]]ba'o/_/de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la/_yun ring po'i don la phan pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni/_'di la de bzhin du byas par gyur na/_'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma la yang bde bar gnas pa'o/_/dge slong dag nga'i dge slong gang la la
[\[89a.4\]]zhig gis stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma zhes bya ba ni/_'di dang gzhan yang mtshungs pa med de/_'di la gang gis kyang gus par 'dzin pa'o/_/mdo sde 'dis shing skam po la skud pas bcings na zhes bya ba ni/_'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang rjes su yi rang ba la sogs
[\[89a.5\]]pas dad pa skyes nas de bzhin du tshe thung ba rnams la tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/bkra mi shis pa ni shis par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal ba mi thob pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang /_bu med pa bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi sgo nas kyang 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de las lo ma dang
[\[89a.6\]]me tog dang 'bras bu rnams skye bar 'gyur na/_rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta ci smos te zhes bya ba ni/_gzhi bems po yang de bzhin du snang ste/_byang chub sems dang ldan pa mi la sogs pa'i sems can yang /_tshe thung ba rnams tshe ring bar byed pa/_longs spyod
[\[89a.7\]]med pa rnams longs spyod dang ldan pa 'gro ba rigs drug gi sdug bsngal yang 'joms par byed pa'o/_/sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni/_da ltar byas pa da ltar 'byang ba'o/_/dge dang mi dge ba de bzhin de yin te/_dper na zhag tu lon
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]pa'i 'o ma bskol du mi btub pa de bzhin du/_dge ba dang mi dge ba yang de bzhin yin no/_/des na sngon gyi las ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag
[\[89b.2\]]gis/_'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni/_dge slong rnams kyis zhu ba phul ba'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde chen po lnga gsungs pa ni/_'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/_gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa rnams te/_
[\[89b.3\]]de bzhin du ye shes rnam pa lnga'i sgo nas kyang yod de/_skye mched drug dang khams lnga'i sgo nas yang yin no/_/stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma dang /_rma bya chen mo dang /_so sor 'brang ma dang /_bsil ba'i tshal dang /_gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'o zhes bya ba ni/_rdo rje
[\[89b.4\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_las kyi rigs su zhugs so/_/yang na 'dul ba'i dbang du byas na phal chen pa dang /_thams cad smra ba dang /_gnas brtan pa dang /_mang pos bkur ba dang /_gcig ni rigs la mi gtogs
[\[89b.5\]]te/_yang na rigs thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid yin no/_/yang bstan pa'o/_/bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_gdol ba'i rigs so/_/de dag kyang kri ya'i dbang du 'gyur na/_bram ze'i rigs zhes bya'o/_/de dag ni
[\[89b.6\]]sems can gyi don la byas te/_grong khyer yangs pa can du gsungs pa dang /_rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab nas gsungs pa dang /_dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du gsungs pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i yul du
[\[89b.7\]]gsungs pa dang bya rgod phung po'i ri la gsungs pa dang de dag ni mdo chen mo lnga yin no/_/zas sna lnga ni zhes bya ba ni sha dang 'dres pa'i zas yin te de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag zas rnam pa lnga
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]yongs su spongs la chongs shig ces kyang bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/_zas rnam pa lnga ni dug dang 'dres pa'i zas yin te/_de yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las byung de dang mi ldan pa ni zas nyung ba'o/_/zas bsod snyoms la brten te rab tu byung shig
[\[90a.2\]]ces gsungs na zhes bya ba ni/_re re mi 'gro zhing rab tu byung ba zla ba dang 'grogs shing gnas pa bsod snyoms kyi zas kyang chags pa med par gsum du bgo ste/_rang za ba dang yi dgas dang gzhan la dbul ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das zas rnam lnga dang ma 'dres pa'i bsod
[\[90a.3\]]snyoms ni nyung /_'di ltar zas rnam lnga dang 'dres pa de ni mang lags na zhes bya ba ni/_dge slong rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la zas kyi don du zhus pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag gis ji ltar nan tan du bgyi zhes bya ba ni/_gal te zas rnam pa
[\[90a.4\]]lnga lhung bzed du lhung bar gyur na/_thabs ci bdog ces pa'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/_zas rnam pa lnga'i don la dge slong rnams la phan pa'i phyir gsungs pa'o/_/'di skad ces
[\[90a.5\]]bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni/_dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phul ba la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'o/_/dge slong dag de nyid kyi phyir/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i mdo sde 'chang ba des zhes bya ba ni/_sdig pa dag kyang mi
[\[90a.6\]]chugs te/_zas sna lnga dag kyang med do/_/rma med pa'i nor bu zhes bya ba ni/_yang dag pa'i don yin te/_yang dag pa'i don ni gang zhe na/_gnyis su yang med gnyis su brtags pa yang med do/_/so sor brtags pa yang med do/_/gzungs zhes bya ba bdag nyid
[\[90a.7\]]srung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/_stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma 'di yang /_dge slong rnams la yang dag par gsungs te/_de yang zas rnam lnga srung bar byed pa'o/_/chongs shig_/des bsod snyoms len pa'i tshe/_zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni/_'di la rnam par rtog pa med par/_rig sngags 'dis sel ba'o/_/zas rnam lnga dang 'dres pa'i bsod snyoms la yang zas rnam lnga ma 'dres so snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_gal te rgyus med pa'i sems can rnams kyis dad pas bsod
[\[90b.2\]]snyoms la byon par gyur na/_de'i don la mi dmigs par bsam pa'o/_/'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba ni/_'dus byas ni byas pa'i chos yin te/_de yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bur snang ba'o/_/mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes
[\[90b.3\]]dang zhes bya ba ni/_rmi lam lta bu skyu ma lta bu de yang /_lus kyi sdug bsngal du shes par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_'jig rten gyi khams snang ba 'di sgyu ma lta bu yang dmigs pa stong pa nyid du snang ba'o/_/zas rnam

[\[117b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa/_/gnyis pa'i sems ni 'dir med do/_/de skad du gsungs pa'o/_/kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas sems can don du bka' stsal pa'o/_/'di ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying po yin no zhes bya ba ni/_

[\[118a.1\]]bya ba ni/_khyim mam yul lam nags tshal mes tshig par gyur na/_de'i nang du chud nas kyang me'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/chu'i nang na 'dug gam zhes bya ba ni/_rgya mtsho'i nang na rdzing chen po las rgal ba'am/_gru'i nang na chud pa'am/_rab rgal la

[\[118a.5\]]khyim la mi mthun pas rtsod pa'o/_/de la yid la byed par gyur na yang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/sbrul gyis zin tam zhes bya ba ni/_gdug pa can rnams 'chi ba'i dug gis zin pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yid la dran pa tsam gyis kyang dug des kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/

[\[118b.1\]]phra mo las thar bar 'gyur te/_rlung las gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_rlung gi nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin du mkhris pa'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las

[\[119a.1\]]pa'i rigs pa ni spu zing zhes bya bas so zhes bya ba ni/_gti mug dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog go/_/spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni/_de bzhin du thar par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/_dug lnga'i rang bzhin gyis bkag pa'i mun pa ni/_

[\[126b.1\]]mi legs pa yang sbyor ba'i dug yin te/_sbrang rtsi dang mar gnyis mnyam por byas nas 'khar phor gyi nang du zhag bdun bzhag ste/_de yang byed pa'i dug go/_/mkhris pa la tsha ba btang na de yang dug yin te/_rlung la grang ba gtang ba yang dug go/_/'jig rten pa'i dug 'di ni rang bzhin
