[\[191b.2\]]zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dkar mo spyan gsum pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/g.yas gnyis na phreng ba dang dung bsnams pa/_g.yon gnyis na rma bya'i sgro dang /_sbrul bsnams pa'o/_/bzhengs nas bzhugs pa/_zla ba'i gdan la
[\[191b.3\]]nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/_thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o zhes bya ba ni/_thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin rig pa mthar thug pa de'i rang bzhin mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas gsungs
[\[191b.4\]]pa'o/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni zhal bzhi phyag brgyad pa sku mdog dkar po/_spyan gsum pa/_ral pa'i thor tshugs can/_tshangs par spyod pa'i rang bzhin can/_phyag g.yas pa rnams na phyag 'tshal ba dang /_phreng ba dang /_bum pa dang /_mchog sbyin du mdzad
[\[191b.5\]]pa'o/_/g.yon rnams ni po ti dang /_dbyu gu gsum pa dang /_bum pa spyi blugs dang /_mnyam gzhag go/_/zhabs pad+ma'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/_pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras shing rjes su
[\[191b.6\]]yi rang ba'i rig sngags kyi gsang sngags blta ba'o/_/rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni hi li hi li mi li la sogs pa'o/_/dug bcom mo dug nges par bcom mo zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis nang gi dug gsum dang /_phyi'i dug

[\[200a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni/_'dzam bu'i gling gi byang ngos kyi cha na ri'i rgyar dpag tshad gsum/_dpangs su dpag tshad gnyis pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gyi gser de na gnas so/_/ri'i rgyal po 'od 'dzin dang zhes bya ba ni/_'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs na dpal gyi ri zhes
[\[200a.6\]]bya ba yin te/_de la mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod do/_/dpangs su dpag tshad phyed dang sum brgya de'i gnas na yang dngos grub can thams cad gnas pa'o/_/ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin dang zhes bya ba ni/_ri'i rgyal po rnam 'dud nas dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu bor te/_
[\[200a.7\]]dpag tshad brgyad khri chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten pa/_dpag tshad drug brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ni chu las gyen du 'phags pa'o/_/dpangs su yang de dang 'dra ste/_dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes te/_gser las grub pa/_de na rgyal chen bzhi'i grong dang grong
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]khyer dang ljongs gnas so/_/ci'i phyir mu khyud 'dzin zhes bya zhe na/_ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin gyi rtse mo/_/dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ni/_dper na shing rta'i mu khyud bzhin te/_de bas na ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug dang zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[200b.2\]]phyi'i rgya mtsho bor te/_dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten/_dpag tshad sum brgya rtsa phyed dang bcu gsum ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/_/rngams su yang de dang 'dra ste/_dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_lcags las grub pa/_de na
[\[200b.3\]]gnod sbyin gos sngon po can rnams gnas so/_/ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ri zhes bya zhe na/_ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ri de dang de dag na/_ji ltar gser gyi 'khor lo yod pa bzhin du/_ri gzhan dag la med pa dang /_gzhan yang ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ris gling bzhi pa 'di
[\[200b.4\]]'khor lo'i tshul du bskor te/_de'i phyir ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug ri zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug chen po dang zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong 'jig rten khams rnams bskor ba/_'og ni gser gyi sa gzhi yan chod yod pa/_steng ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad yod pa'o/_/gzhi
[\[200b.5\]]ni lcags las byas pa/_des bskor ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhing khams su shes par bya'o/_/khyab pa che bas na 'khor yug chen por btags so/_/ri'i rgyal po dbang po'i brag dang zhes bya ba ni/_ri rab kyi steng gi sa gzhi na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
[\[200b.6\]]grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba/_chur dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/_rgyar yang de dang 'dra ste/_mthar skor du khri yod pa/_gser gyir bas bskor ba ste/_ra ba de la 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa ste/_rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i lcog bzhi yod de/_lha'i grong khyer de na sgo dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu
[\[200b.7\]]yod do/_/sgo re re la 'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum zheng du phyed dang gnyis pa/_sgo re re la rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i gzer skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa bzhi bzhi yod do/_/sgo re re la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i srung ma go cha gon zhing mtshon cha thogs pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]grong khyer de'i dbus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba/_chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/_rgyar yang de dang 'dra ste/_mtha' skor du stong yod pa/_lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang lnga gyen du 'phags so/_/rmang rten du yang rin po che sna bzhi
[\[201a.2\]]las byas pa/_de'i phyir dbang po'i brag ces bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/_de yang bsam gtan dang po la gnas te/_tshangs pa gang na gnas ba na tshangs ldan no/_/ri'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/_'dzam bu'i gling na gnas te/_dpal gyi ri'i byang
[\[201a.3\]]phyogs na rgyar dpag tshad sum brgya yod de/_dpangs su yang sum brgya'o/_/de'i sa gzhi ni dpal dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no/_/ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug dang zhes bya ba ni/_ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can nas dpag tshad khri bor te/_dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyis
[\[201a.4\]]gzhi chen po la brten te/_dpag tshad lnga stong ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/_/zheng du yang de dang 'dra'o/_/dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_gser las grub pa de na rgyal chen bzhi'i grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs gnas so/_/ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug ces
[\[201a.5\]]bya zhe na/_ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug gi rtse mo ji ltar dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bzhin du ri gzhan dag med de de'i phyir na ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug ces bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po shin tu rgyas dang zhes bya ba ni/_rgya gar yul dang bod yul bar na ri'i rgyar dpag tshad gsum
[\[201a.6\]]yod pa/_dpangs su yang de bzhin te/_sa'i rir grags pa/_mtha' skor du gling bzhir bskor ba'o/_/ri'i rgyal po rin chen 'byung gnas dang zhes bya ba ni/_zangs kyi gling dang rin chen gling gi bar na gnas te/_rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa/_rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus na yod pa/_
[\[201a.7\]]mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/_dpangs su dpag tshad sum brgya/_rgya mtsho'i rin po che thams cad kyang de nas byung ngo /_/ri'i rgyal po srin bu can dang zhes bya ba ni/_rgya gar dang bal yul gyi bar na yod de/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad sum brgya/_dpangs su dpag tshad lnga'o/_/sems
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]can thams cad gnas pa'i phyir na srin bu can zhes btags so/_/ri'i rgyal po nor bu'i rdza dang zhes bya ba ni/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi byang ngos na yod de/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad drug brgya/_dpangs su bzhi brgya'o/_/de'i sa na yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du yod pas na
[\[201b.2\]]nor bu'i rdza zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po thags bzangs ris dang zhes bya ba ni/_ri rab kyi steng gi byang ngos na/_lha ma yin gyi gnas kyi dbus na lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags bzangs ris kyi bzhugs sa/_de bzhugs pa'i phyir na thags bzangs ris zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po rdo rje 'byung
[\[201b.3\]]gnas dang zhes bya ba ni/_bal yul gyi nub ngos na spre'u'i rgyal po ha lu ma d+ha'i lag gi bar nas shor ba'i ri/_de la mtha' skor la dpag tshad lnga/_'phang du dpag tshad gnyis/_brag rdo rje lta bu yod pa'i phyir na/_rdo rje'i brag ces bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po 'gram ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[201b.4\]]bal yul gyi shar phyogs na spre'u'i rgyal po ha lu ma d+has bor ba/_mtha' skor la dpag tshad lnga bcu/_'phang du dpag tshad drug go/_/'gram pa bzhin du snang ba'i phyir na 'gram ldan zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po lha min 'bab dang zhes bya ba ni/_ri spos kyi ngad ldan de'i byang phyogs
[\[201b.5\]]dpag tshad nyi shu na/_gser gyi brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos bya skyibs zhes bya ba yod de/_chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/_zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi yod pa/_dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes
[\[201b.6\]]pa'o/_/ri'i rgyal po glog 'od dang zhes bya ba ni/_nub phyogs ba lang spyod kyi shar phyogs dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar na ri bo yod de/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad sum brgya/_'phang du dpag tshad nyis brgya/_rgyu gser las byas pa/_glog gi 'od bzhin lhan ne lhang nge yod pas
[\[201b.7\]]glog ces bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po khyab gnas dang zhes bya ba ni/_lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling bskor ba mtha' skor du 'dzam bu'i gling tsam yod de/_'phang du dpag tshad khri yod pa/_rgya che bas khyab gnas zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal zla 'od dang zhes bya ba ni/_shar gyi lus 'phags kyi nub/_
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]dpag tshad lnga brgya na shel las grub pa'i ri yod de/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong ngo /_/zla ba bzhin du bsil bas na zla 'od ces bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po brag bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/_rgya gar gyi nub byang
[\[202a.2\]]mtshams na ka ling+ga'i 'gram na gnod sbyin ku be ra'i gnas yin te/_rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i mtha' skor dpag tshad lnga brgya/_'phang du sum brgya/_gzhan pas bzang ba'i phyir na brag bzangs zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po nyi ma mdzes dang zhes bya ba ni/_gnya' shing
[\[202a.3\]]'dzin yang zer ri'i rgyal po ri rab nas dpag tshad brgyad khri bor te/_dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la brten te/_dpag tshad bzhi khri ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/_/zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/_dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_gser las grub pa ste/_
[\[202a.4\]]de na rgyal chen bzhi'i grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs gnas so/_/ri'i rgyal po thigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_zangs gling gi mdun na ri bo chen po yod de/_srin mo'am srin po rgyu ba/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgyad pa/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga yod pa/_thigs pa bzhin du snang bas na thigs pa
[\[202a.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po 'bigs byed dang zhes bya ba ni/_de yang gser gling na yod de phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram mtha' skor du dpag tshad phyed dang nyis brgya yod de/_'phang du dpag tshad brgya'o/_/ri de ni mtshon bzhin du yod de/_de'i phyir 'bigs byed ces bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po zla ba'i brag dang
[\[202a.6\]]zhes bya ba ni/_o D+yan gyi yul gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad gsum na/_ri de'i mtha' skor du dpag tshad drug yod de/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis so/_/de'i rtse mo la zla ba bzhin du gnas pa zla ba'i brag ces bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po sna tshogs brtsegs dang zhes bya ba ni/_rgya nag po'i
[\[202a.7\]]ngos na ri bo rtse lnga ba mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya pa/_'phang du dpag tshad phyed dang sum brgya/_dkar po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_sngon po dang /_kha dog mdzes shing snang bas na sna tshogs mdzes zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang zhes bya ba ni/_zangs gling gi lho ngos na tsan+dan gyi
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]nags gseb yod de/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/_'phang du dpag tshad brgya'o/_/de'i lho phyogs na bya khyung yod pa ste/_shin tu drang ba'i phyir na ma la yar btags so/_/ri'i rgyal po gser gyi rtse mo dang zhes bya ba ni/_gshol mda' 'dzin zhes bya ba'o/_/ri'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin
[\[202b.2\]]las dpag tshad bzhi khri bor te/_dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la brten/_dpag tshad nyi khri chu las gyen du 'phags so/_/zheng du yang de dang 'dra'o/_/dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_gser las grub ste/_de na rgyal chen bzhi ba'i grong dang grong khyer dang
[\[202b.3\]]ljongs gnas so/_/ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po gshol mda' 'dzin zhes bya ba ni/_ri'i rgyal po gshol mda' 'dzin gyi rtse mo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_dper na gshol mda' bzhin te/_de'i phyir na gshol mda' 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po kun nas 'gro dang zhes
[\[202b.4\]]bya ba ni/_ti se gangs kyi ri'i byang ngos na/_tha mal pa'i yul gyi so mtshams/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling du khyab pa'i phyir na kun nas 'gro zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po lag bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/_gser gyi ri ste rgya mtsho'i dbus na
[\[202b.5\]]gnas te/_'og gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa/_chu las 'phags pa ni dpag tshad brgyad stong 'phags so/_/lag pa bzhin du gnas pas na lag bzangs zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po nor bu ldan dang zhes bya ba ni/_sgra mi snyan gyi shar phyogs na nor bu rin po che sna tshogs yod pa/_mtha' skor
[\[202b.6\]]du dpag tshad lnga brgya/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya'o/_/nor bu rin po che thams cad de la ldan te/_de lta bas na nor bu ldan zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po sde bzangs dang zhes bya ba ni/_ba lang spyod kyi nub ngos na/_dpag tshad khri mtha' skor du yod pa/_dpag tshad lnga stong 'phang du'o/_/
[\[202b.7\]]shin tu dbyibs legs pa blta na sdug pa'i phyir na/_sde bzangs su btags pa'o/_/ri'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i mchu dang zhes bya ba ni/_chu gang+gA'i 'gram ga ya zhes bya ba na/_ri bo rked sum nyag yod de/_mtha' skor dpag tshad brgyad yod do/_/rked nyag la dpag tshad re re/_'phang
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]du yang lnga bcu'o/_/de na tshangs pa gnas pa'i phyir/_tshangs pa'i mchu zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po rig byed srung dang zhes bya ba ni/_de yang de'i rtsa na yod de/_dbyibs dang rgya dang 'phang yang de bzhin no/_/de la tshangs pa gnas shing rig byed bzhi gnas de nas byung

[\[203a.3\]]phreng dang zhes bya ba ni/_'dzam bu gling gi byang ngos na rgya nag po'i byang shar mtshams na gnas pa/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa/_rtse mo la phreng ba bzhin du gnas pas na sna tshogs phreng zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po mi 'jigs sna tshogs dang zhes bya ba ni/_

[\[203a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni/_'dzam bu'i gling gi lho ngos na/_yul spyi bo gtsug na ri ral gri'i dbyibs su yod pa/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/_'phang du nyis brgya'o/_/ral gri bzhin du rtse mo rno bas na/_ral gri zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po gdung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/_'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na

[\[203a.7\]]mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya pa/_'phang du dpag tshad sum brgya'o/_/mi mi thar ba/_mi ma yin gnas pa'o/_/ri'i rgyal po muny+dza dang zhes bya ba ni/_mnga' ris kyi shar ngos gangs kyi ri rtse gcig tu yod pa/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/_'phang du dpag tshad sum
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]brgya gnas pa/_rtse mo rno ba'o/_/de na gnas pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i bu gzhon nu gdong drug gnas so/_/ri'i rgyal po ri dgas can dang zhes bya ba ni/_bal yul gyi byang ngos na gnas te/_dbyibs ri dgas shar na bzhin du gnas te/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga pa/_'phang
[\[203b.2\]]du dpag tshad gsum mo/_/ri dgas bzhin du yod pas na ri dgas can zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po 'joms byed dang zhes bya ba ni/_bal yul dang rgya gar gyi mtshams na/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad bzhi yod pa/_'phang du gnyis so/_/ri'i rgyal po ti se dang zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[203b.3\]]gangs kyi ri yin te/_de yang rtse gsum du yod pa/_lha ma hA de ba yod pa/_mtha' skor dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/_'phang du yang lnga brgya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po mi mjed dang zhes bya ba ni/_ti se'i byang ngos na dpag tshad lnga yod pa'i bar na/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/_'phang du dpag tshad sum
[\[203b.4\]]cu'o/_/ri'i rgyal po tsan+dan phreng dang zhes bya ba ni/_ma la ya'i shar phyogs kyi bar na dpag tshad lnga yod de/_tsan+dan gyi nags gseb sbrul gdug pa can yod pa/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya yod pa/_'phang du yang brgya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po stobs 'dzin khyam dang zhes
[\[203b.5\]]bya ba ni/_rgya nag po na gnas te/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa/_ri'i rgyal po dbang chen dang zhes bya ba ni/_rgya bod kyi bar na ri bo chen po/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya/_'phang du dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/_/ri'i rgyal po dus
[\[203b.6\]]'bri byed dang zhes bya ba ni/_bal yul dang rgya gar 'khor nas yod pa/_mtha' skor du dpag tshad khri yod pa/_'phang du lnga brgya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po skem byed dang zhes bya ba ni/_dus 'bri byed kyi byang ngos dpag tshad gcig na/_mtha' skor yang de bzhin no/_/'phang du
[\[203b.7\]]dpag tshad drug brgya'o/_/ri'i rgyal po ba lang srung zhes bya ba ni/_bal yul gyi nub ngos na/_dbang phyug chen po'i lha gnas pa/_dpag tshad lnga mtha' skor ro/_/'phang du dpag tshad gsum mo/_/ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra can dang zhes bya ba ni/_zlum pa rgya che ba mtha'
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]skor du dpag tshad bcu pa/_'phang du dpag tshad bcu'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing khams su grags pa'o/_/ri'i rgyal po brten pa 'dzin dang zhes bya ba ni/_rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa/_rgya che ba gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa/_rgyu yang gser las byas pa'o/_/
[\[204a.2\]]ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri dang zhes bya ba ni/_ri blta na sdug pa dpag tshad lnga stong bor te/_dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten te/_dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya chu las gyen du 'phags te/_zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/_dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes
[\[204a.3\]]pa/_de na rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs gnas so/_/ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri zhes bya na/_ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri'i rtse mo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ni/_dper na rta'i rna ba bzhin te/_de'i phyir ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri zhes bya'o/_/ri'i rgyal
[\[204a.4\]]po rnam 'dud dang zhes bya ba ni/_ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri nas dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya bor nas/_dpag tshad brgyad khri chu'i 'og nas gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten te/_dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu ni chu las gyen du 'phags so/_/rngams su yang de dang 'dra ste/_dbyibs

[\[262b.1\]]kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/_bar ma na rin po che tha ma na be con no/_/g.yon pa'i bar ma na dgra sta/_tha ma na zhags pa'o/_/zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/_g.yon bskum pa/_pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa/_gzhon nu'i cha byad can/_sgeg pa'i tshul dang
[\[262b.2\]]ldan pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/_sa mu tsa/_bi mu tsa la sogs pa'o/_/kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o/_/yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang /_mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni zhes bya
[\[262b.3\]]ba ni/_yul 'khor mtshams gcod pa dang /_nad rnams bcom pa dang /_'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i bar du yang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'di 'dzin pa gang yang /_tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma yang bde ba thob cing
[\[262b.4\]]yang dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/_/'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa nyi ma phyag mtshan dang /_tshe dpag med dang /_mi bskyod pa dang /_rgya mtsho
[\[262b.5\]]rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
[\[262b.6\]]de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_'jam dpal dang /_rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o/_/da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad do zhes bya ba ni/_sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab ste/_bcom
[\[262b.7\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sems can gyi don la rjes su yi rang zhing yang dag par gsungs pa'o/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang bshad do zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags 'di'i lam nas tshangs pa'i ngo bo thob cing /_gus pas mchod par byas te/_tshangs pas kyang rjes su yi rang
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]zhing gsungs pa'o/_/kun dga' bo/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags 'di bzung na ni pha rol tu phyin pa
[\[263a.2\]]bcu thob ste/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_stobs dang /_smon lam dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de bzhin du 'di'i lam nas sa bcu'i byang chub thob pa'o/_/
[\[263a.3\]]ji ltar bstan pa dang /_ji ltar kun chub par byas pa bzhin du shes sam zhes bya ba ni/_mi 'gyur ba rdo rje bzhin du brtan te/_bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bzhin du sems can la khyab pa'o/_/nam mkha' bzhin du kun la khyab ste/_'jig rten gyi
[\[263a.4\]]khams thams cad la yang ma lus par chos kyis khyab pa'o/_/ye shes kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs te/_de bltas pa'i phyir na shes par grags pa'o/_/mthong ngam las byed pa de la ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su
[\[263a.5\]]gzung ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar byas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/_ye shes med par ye shes thob cing /_dper na mun pa'i nang na me mar btang ba bzhin du bstan te/_yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing 'jig rten 'di yang bsrung zhing skyob ste/_shing ljon pa nyi ma shar
[\[263a.6\]]ba'i dus su sems can der song ba rnams bsil bar byed de/_ji srid ma shi'i bar du/_nad dang 'bral zhing dpal dang ldan te/_mya ngan la sogs pa bor zhing bde ba la gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshe phyi ma la yang chos 'di dran zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/_bcom

[\[263b.1\]]sngags kyis rgyas btab pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_gang zag dang /_sems can thams cad dang /_'di 'dzin par byed pa gang yang rung ba la/_bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab pa dang /_

[\[263b.3\]]phyi ma yang de bzhin no/_/mtshams gcad do zhes bya ba ni/_ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams yi ge la bris la mnan par bya ste/_de'i steng du yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzugs 'di bris la bum pa chen po byas te/_rab tu gnas pa byas nas/_rig sngags kyi gsang sngags bris nas mchod

[\[264a.2\]]ba'o/_/lam ma yin pa ni/_rgyal po chen po rnams kyi bu yin te/_de bzhis kyang rgyal phran dang /_'khor la sogs pa bskul zhing /_sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas so/_/de dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni/_shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang rnams gnod pa skyel

[\[264b.1\]]yang mi tshugs so/_/chu'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_chu'i nang na gzings chen po la yod par gyur na/_gar btang na yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/mi yi 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po dang /_mi rgod la sogs pa yin te/_de'i nyes pas kyang 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ste/_

[\[267a.1\]]no/_/nad med cing 'byung po rnams kyi 'tshe ba yang mi 'byung ngo /_/kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa'o/_/srin mo chen mo nag mo zhes bya ba ni/_gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste/_ri rab kyi rtse mo yang sgul nus pa ste/_
[\[267a.2\]]de'i dbyibs dang /_kha dog la sogs pa ni/_ming dang mthun te/_phyag mtshan ni/_gri gug dang /_thod pa bsnams shing ral pa ring po gcig tu 'khyil pa yod de/_mi srun zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/_/bu stong yod pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni/_ma
[\[267a.3\]]bzhin du bu rnams kyang yin te/_sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing zas 'tshol bar byed pa ste/_lang ka'i lho phyogs na rgya mtsho'i 'gram na tshal cig na gnas pa'o/_/mtshan gcig gis dpag tshad brgyad khrir phyin pa cig yod do zhes bya ba ni/_sha dang /_khrag yod pa'i sar
[\[267a.4\]]gnas kyang tshor nas/_bslangs nas khyer nus pa ste/_de bzhin du sha dang /_khrag gi phyir sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/_/sha khrag 'thung zhing srog 'phrog pa'o/_/gang de'i ming shes pa dang /_rus shes pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
[\[267a.5\]]gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i gzi brjid kyis/_ming dang rus shes par 'gyur te/_de'i gzi brjid kyis kyang /_de rnams kyis gnod mi nus shing /_'thab rtsod yod na nam yang rgyal bar byed cing grogs kyang byed pa'o/_/de srung bar byed ces bya ba la sogs pa ni/_rig

[\[271a.7\]]so/_/dbus ni snas mnam mo/_/to de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos/_de nas gser dngul brdung ma dang /_sil lcags zangs bzhi dang /_dbus na gser gyi 'khar ba dang ril ba rnyed do/_/de nas tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos gser de sbas nas/_dga' mgu zhing rab tu dga'

[\[271b.1\]]ste/_rangs nas dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_mnyan yod nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tsos rgyang ring
[\[271b.2\]]po nas 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed kyi tau de'i bu/_bram ze'i khye'u ne tso rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/_btsun pa de ltar lags so/_/gal te tau de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u ne tso de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas par

[\[303b.1\]]dge ba thams cad de nas 'byung zhing bshad de gsal bar bshad pas mdo zhes bya'o/_/chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /_ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_de lta bu'i ye shes kyi don thob pas na thob pa ste/_da lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi don gyis 'jigs pa med
[\[303b.2\]]cing gnod pa yang mi mnga' ste/_sems can rnams la phan par byed pa'o/_/gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang /_/nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_ma rungs pa thams cad de rnams kyis byed de/_sdig pa yang de rnams kyis byed pa/_sems
[\[303b.3\]]can la gnod par byed cing za ba dang 'thung ba tshol ba'o/_/phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung /_/de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi dmod mos/_ma rungs pa thams cad rlag par byed cing thal bar btang ste/_ma dad pa
[\[303b.4\]]rnams kyang snang bar mi byed do/_/lha dang lha min rlung lha dang /_/ma mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang /_/'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams dang /_/phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa dang /_dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams
[\[303b.5\]]yin te/_de yang ye shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi lha mo rnams so/_/gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni/_/me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing /_/zhes bya ba ni/_'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal yas khang la gnas te/_ye shes pa yang de bzhin yin te/_so
[\[303b.6\]]so rang rang gi 'od zer gyi snang bas nam mkha' la mdzes par snang ba'o/_/nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra bar/_/rin chen las byas shin tu snang /_/zhes bya ba ni/_mun pa mun nag gi nang na/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches mi snang ste/_de bzhin du nyi ma zla bas gsal bar byas
[\[303b.7\]]shing rin po che mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du glo bur gyi skyon nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bkag cing /_bla ma dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag bstan pas ye shes de snang ba'o/_/bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang /_/rab sdang gdon rnams rnam par spangs/_/zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]de bzhin de'i dge ba byas pa'i bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/gnod par byed pa dang /_sdig ba bsags pa thams cad des de'i 'joms par byed pa'o/_/mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i/_/'byung po grul bum srin po dang /_/zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[304a.2\]]khams gsum tsam yang skad cig gis khyab ste/_/la la bza' rgyu yod cing mchod par 'os te/_la la sems can rnams kyis kyang sdang zhing dmod mos pa'o/_/de 'byung po rnams kyis kyang mi'i sems can la gnod par byed pa'o/_/yi dgas srul po de dag gis/_/rmad
[\[304a.3\]]byung de dag mi mthong ste/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye shes sdig can de dag gis mi mthong zhing de dag rnams kyang bde bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzi brjid ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis/_/grong khyer du yang mi 'gro'o/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'jig
[\[304a.4\]]rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams te/_sems can la gnod par mi byed cing /_byams pa dang snying rjes 'tsho ba'o/_/de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyang rtsar 'gro bar mi nus shing /_/gnas kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/'byung po chen po 'du ba
[\[304a.5\]]na/_/der yang de dag 'dur mi dbang /_/zhes bya ba ni/_sems can la gnod par byed pa 'byung po de kun yang /_lcang lo can gyi pho brang ci smos te/_de'i ra ba'i phyi rol yang mi thob cing /_rig sngags kyi dmod mos bde bar mi gnas pa'o/_/stan nam yang na chu
[\[304a.6\]]yang rung /_/zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo /_/zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin de la dam las 'das pa rnams 'thung ba dang za ba ci smos te/_'thung ba'i skom yang zangs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]chur mthong ngo /_/bza' ba'i zas kyang lcags kyi thu lum 'bar bar mthong /_lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du/_/
[\[304a.7\]]nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lcang lo can gyi pho brang du sdig can 'byung po gnod byed rnams dang /_gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams kyis srung zhing pho brang nang du stan yang thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig_/'byung
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]po gang zhig mi nyan pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis smras pa ste/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po ni/_yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_spyan mi bzang dang /_lus ngan po rnams yin te/_de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mo dang rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas/_'byung
[\[304b.2\]]po de rnams bde bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de yi kha nas khrag dron dag_/myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_ma rungs pa'i 'byung po de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pas myur du nad kyis thebs te/_kha nas khrag dron skyug cing srog gi dus la bab ste/_mda'
[\[304b.3\]]'phangs pa bzhin du myur du dmyal bar skyes so/_/de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas/_/phol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po de rnams kyi brla g.yas rol nas ma rungs pa'i nad 'byung ste/_de ci'i phyir 'byung zhe na/_rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa
[\[304b.4\]]dang /_sems can la gnod par byas pa'i phyir ro/_/de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing /_/gdon sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_nad de rnams kyis btab na 'chi ste/_tshe phyi ma la ngan song gsum du skye zhing /_'byung po'i lus blangs par gyur kyang
[\[304b.5\]]gzhan rnams kyis bsnyen du mi btub cing /_/de bas kyang sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten skyong gis bshad pa yi/_/mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'jig rten skyong ba bcu po ste/_brgya byin dang /_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_gnod
[\[304b.6\]]sbyin dang /_me lha dang /_srin po dang /_rlung lha dang /_dbang ldan dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_tshangs pa dang /_sa bdag dang ngo /_/de rnams kyis kyang chad par gsungs so/_/yang na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba ni thabs la mkhas pa/_sems can la
[\[304b.7\]]snying rje che ba/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so/_/de rnams kyis kyang bden pa'i bka' gsungs pa'o/_/'jigs pa thams cad de la'o/_/mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/zhes bya ba ni/_sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_me'i char 'bab pa dang /_gnod sbyin
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]'byung po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_za ba dang skom med cing rig sngags kyang dmod mos 'chi ba'i dus su mgo tshal par 'gas nas 'chi'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig_/gnod sbyin gang dag ma nyan pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po chen po rnams
[\[305a.2\]]thos kyi bu la sogs pas gsungs te/_rig sngags kyi bka' las 'da' ba dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bka' ma nyan par gyur na/_de rnams kyis sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o/_/'byung po srin po gang yod pa/_/ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[305a.3\]]'byung po de rnams ni gcig la gcig gi phrag dog gis ngan sems skye ste/_de'i ngan pa yang nas yang du ngan pa'o/_/lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi/_/mtshon cha spu gri so 'dra bas/_/zhes bya ba ni/_de yis de ngan pa rnams ni rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das te/_
[\[305a.4\]]mtshon cha lta bu'i las kyi spu gris yang nas yang du gcod cing sdug bsngal chen po thob pa'o/_/gnod sbyin de dag brlag par 'gyur/_/rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das pa dang /_rig sngags kyi
[\[305a.5\]]bka'i dmod mos rlag par byed pa ste/_de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang /_dpal dang ldan pa ni gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba ste/_rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing sems can gyi don byed pa'o/_/go cha sra zhing mtshon rno la/_stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag_/ces bya ba ni/_
[\[305a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /_rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa la ni/_de dag dang 'khod par byas nas/_/mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs nas phyogs phyogs su bsdad pa'o/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[305a.7\]]dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/_de bzhin du grul bum gyi rgyal po 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa'o/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/zhes bya ba ni/_klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/_de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang yin no/_/go cha gon zhing mtshon sna tshogs pa stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/de dag de na 'khod pa yi/_/nyen skor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas/_/zhes bya ba ni phyogs bzhi nas bu dang 'khor
[\[305b.2\]]g.yog dang chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang phyogs phyogs nas srung zhing gnas pa'o/_/seng ge'i gzugs dang stag gi gzugs/_/mi sdug pa dang 'gro zhing rgyu/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po de rnams kyang 'dul bar byed pa'i rgyal po rnams ni seng ge dang stag gi mgo can du gnas
[\[305b.3\]]pa'o/_/skad cig mas stong rgyu zhing 'khor bar gnas pa'o/_/glang chen gzugs dang rta yi gzugs/_/kha cig ma he'i gzugs can te/_/zhes bya ba ni stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/_skad cig mas ri rab rtse mo dang bar snang dang sa steng dang sa 'og tu dus gcig tu rgyu'o/_/
[\[305b.4\]]dred mo dang ni ba yi gzugs/_/lug dang spyang ki phag rgod rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po de rnams kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs su sprul zhing sems can rnams la bstan pa'o/_/rna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che/_/rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_glang po che bzhin du
[\[305b.5\]]rna ba 'phyang ba ste/_rna ba gcig pus gos byas shing /_/lus po thams cad khebs pa ste/_/de bzhin du gzugs bstan zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o/_/skad cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa/_/sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed/_/ces bya ba ni/_bum pa'i nang du skad
[\[305b.6\]]smras pa bzhin du sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas shing 'jigs par byed de/_bar chod byed pa dang /_gnod par byed pa'i dus su sa g.yo zhing skad sna tshogs 'don par byed pa'o/_/bong bu dang ni rnga mo che/_/cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod/_/ces bya ba ni/_mi'i lus la rnga mo
[\[305b.7\]]bong bu'i mgo bo dang /_gzhan yang sems can gyi gzugs su sprul nas/_gzugs dngos su bstan pa dang /_rmi lam du bstan pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po stobs po che/_/de dag phan tshun 'du ba ni/_/zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin du stobs dang ldan pas 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang /_
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]rgyal po chen po rnams kyis 'dul zhing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o/_/lha yi shing rta bcas pa yis/_/nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed/_/ces bya ba ni/_sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha thogs shing dpung dang bcas shing 'gro ba ste/_de bzhin du bar
[\[306a.2\]]snang dang sa 'og dang sa stengs la rgyu ba'o/_/gnod sbyin dag gi bdag po yang /_/mi rnams la ni bde legs byed/_/ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing /_gnod sbyin 'khor g.yog stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bdag po ste/_
[\[306a.3\]]rnam thos kyi bu de yang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing /_snying rje la gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du rig sngags la mchod par byed cing /_gus par byed pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/_las kyi rigs las/_las kyi rigs ma yin te/_mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan
[\[306a.4\]]gyi ye shes/_/mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o/_/ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can/_sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/_spyan gsum zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu'o/_/zhal g.yas mthing ga_/g.yon dmar ba ste/_phyag g.yas pa gnyis na
[\[306a.5\]]ral gri dang rdo rje rgya gram mo/_/g.yon pa gnyis na/_skyabs sbyin dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/_/phyag 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste/_rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o/_/zhabs g.yas bskum pa/_g.yon brkyang ba/_pad+ma dang zla
[\[306a.6\]]ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing /_nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing bzhad pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_b+ha ga hu mu le b+ha ga hu mu le/_zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu/_/mi la zhon pa sde bcas

[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]g.yos par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di'i gzi brjid dang stobs kyis rlung tshub sna tshogs 'byung ste/_sa ni lan drug tu g.yos shing /_dril bu'i skad bzhin du rings par snang ngo /_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i/_/rin chen

[\[306b.3\]]gzugs su sprul zhing rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan te/_skad sna tshogs kyang de bzhin du smras pa'o/_/dngos po rnams kyang 'bar 'gyur ro/_/srin po 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags kyi dmod mo dang /_gnod sbyin
[\[306b.4\]]gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i stobs kyis kyang /_ma rungs pa'i srin po 'byung po rnams kyang dngos po rnams ni skrag par 'gyur ro/_/de yi mdun na rgyug par bgyid/_/mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gzi brjid de mthong zhing 'jigs par byed cing phyir
[\[306b.5\]]'gro ba'o/_/'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid/_/che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni/_sems can la 'tshe bar byed cing /_rmi lam nyams pa la yang gzugs bstan zhing /_'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs te rtag tu sems can la
[\[306b.6\]]gnod par byed pa'o/_/drag cing mthong na mi sdug la/_/spu yang ring la sen mo ring /_/zhes bya ba ni/_bzhin mi sdug cing lus dang gdong pa khra bor gnas te/_khab dang 'dra ba'i spus ni lus la khengs shing de bzhin du sder mo yang mtshon dang 'dra ba'o/_/lag na ral gri tho
[\[306b.7\]]ba thogs/_/so ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyid/_/ces bya ba ni/_'byung po de rnams ni khrag khrug la dga' zhing /_phra ma byed pa la dga' ba ste/_de bzhin du khrag khrug byed pa'i sha khrag la dga' zhing 'jigs pa'i ral gri dang 'jigs pa'i zangs kyi so rnams
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa'o/_/sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra/_/drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po 'di rnams kyis kyang sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan zhing /_mi'i lus la mgo gcig pa bstan zhing bud med kyi mngal

[\[307a.3\]]gcig la yang rkang pa gcig med cing /_/lte ba nas res snang res mi snang bar byed de/_la la phyed gzugs su snang zhing sems can rnams skrag par byed pa'o/_/dri ma can la lus skem pa/_/skra brdzes lcags kyi mchu can la/_/zhes bya ba ni keng rus la pags
[\[307a.4\]]pas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ba yod de/_de la drag pa chags shing bzhin mi sdug pa ste/_khab kyi rtse mo tsam gyi mchu la gsus pa yang ri tsam mo/_/de lta bu'i lus la skra bzang brdzes pa'o/_/mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid/_/rna ba gzhu 'dra stobs po che/_/zhes

[\[307a.6\]]drag por gnod pa'o/_/sbrul gyi gzugs can be'u'i gzugs/_/phag gi gzugs can lto bo che/_/zhes bya ba ni/_mi'i lus la mgo brnyan mi gcig pa ste/_rtag tu ltas dang rmi lam la yang de'i gzugs bstan la/_rnam par rtog pa skye bar byed pa'o/_/de skyes pa dang nad drag
[\[307a.7\]]pos mi tshugs te/_nad kyis srog dang bral bar byed pa'o/_/mgo bo che la lag ring ba/_/rna 'phyang po la nu ma 'phyang /_/zhes bya ba ni/_tshan gcig 'dre mo'i gzugs yod de/_dpag tshad brgya'i bar nas kyang 'tshe bar byas shing sha khrag len nus te/_bzhin mi sdug cing
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]lag pa ring ba'i sbar mos 'debs pa'o/_/de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/_/g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/_zhes bya ba ni/_de dag ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor yin te/_stobs che zhing mi srun te/_khams gsum tsam la 'gyur zhing dur khrod
[\[307b.2\]]bsil ba'i tshal na gnas pa'o/_/gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/_/de dag ma ni lam log can/_/zhes bya ba ni/_de dag ni byang phyogs na gnas pa ste/_byang gi phyogs nas 'ongs nas/_tshan gcig phan bya dang gnod bya gnyis byed par 'ongs pa ste/_tshan gcig snying rje
[\[307b.3\]]med cing sems can la 'tshe ba/_tshan gcig snying rje dang ldan zhing sems can la grogs byed pa'o/_/g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu/_/bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/_/zhes bya ba ni/_de dag lta bu'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu
[\[307b.4\]]'khod cing gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/_/chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/_/zhes bya ba ni/_sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed de/_chos dang ldan zhing snying rje skye ste/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis 'tshe bar mi nus
[\[307b.5\]]pa'o/_/drag cing rgod la gtum pa dang /_/lto bo che la skra ring ba/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po de lta bu'i tshan gcig byung ste/_sdig la mi 'dzem zhing sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa drag po'i tshul bstan nas/_phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir 'gyu ba'o/_/mi rnams dang ni ri
[\[307b.6\]]dgas dang /_/bya rnams gzi brjid 'phrog par bgyid/_/ces bya ba ni/_tshan gcig grong ngam grong khyer du phyin cing mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/_tshan gcig ni ri dgas la sogs pa'i sems can la 'tshe bar byas nas srog 'phrog ste/_sems
[\[307b.7\]]can rnams la ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po'o/_/me 'bar za dang mang du za/_/mig gcig pa dang mig ser dang /_/zhes bya ba ni/_bzhin mi sdug cing gzugs sna tshogs bstan te/_sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing ma'i mngal nas zhugs nas gzi brjid
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]'phrogs pa rnams so/_/sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang /_/chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang /_/zhes bya ba ni/_tshan gcig kyang sna dang rna ba bcad pa'i gzugs su byas nas/_sems can 'tshe bar byas te/_de rnams kyis kyang mi rnams kyi lus la zhugs
[\[308a.2\]]nas ma rungs pa thams cad byed pa'o/_/gzhan rnams kyis kyang de'i 'bras bu sna dang rna ba dang /_rkang pa dang /_lag pa gcod pa'i chad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/de yang 'byung po rnams kyis skyon byas pa yin no/_/mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang /_/lus kyang sgur la gnyer
[\[308a.3\]]ma gdong /_/zhes bya ba ni/_de rnams tshan gcig gis kyang sems can rnams la rmi lam dang /_ltas dang /_dngos por mthong bar byas te/_de'i rtog pas nad sna tshogs btang zhing sems can gyi srog 'phrog pa'o/_/de rnams ni ltas ngan gyi 'byung po rnams yin no/_/

[\[312a.3\]]ba ni/_'jig rten gyi ma mo brgyad yin te/_de yang 'di dag gi ming ni 'joms pa'i dngos grub dang /_keng rus can dang /_tshangs chen ma dang /_nag mo chen mo dang /_gzhon nu mo dang /_rnam rgyal mo dang /_drag mo dang /_khyab 'jug mo dang brgyad do/_/de rnams

[\[321b.7\]]log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing 'khor bar 'gro ba re zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas dang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i 'byung po rnams ni/_shi 'phos ma thag tu mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du mnar mes sreg ste/_gal te dmyal ba de nas
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]'phos na yang dmyal ba gzhan du yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/_rgyas par bshad pa'i de nas so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor ba'i sdug
[\[322a.2\]]bsngal thams cad bcom pa/_stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/_thabs la mkhas pa/_'byung po thams cad kyi gnyen po'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum/_sems can rnams la khyad par 'phags pa 'di thos pa'o/_/skrag cing sdangs te/_mi dga'
[\[322a.3\]]la skyi bung zhes byed nas/_thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mdog shor zhing ba sbu rnams kyang gyen du log ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dad pa skyes nas thal mo sbyar ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang
[\[322a.4\]]tshig mthun pa dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po chen po de rnams kyis kyang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o/_/skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/_/sdang
[\[322a.5\]]ba'i 'byung po zad bgyid pa/_/rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs/_/zhes bya ba ni/_sdig can bdud kyi rigs/_sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa rnams/_rig sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o/_/dngos po med cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[322a.6\]]kyis gsungs pa/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/_/mi yi 'jig rten bde bgyid pa'i/_/rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal/_/zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags 'di 'chang ba rnams bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs
[\[322a.7\]]su 'gyur zhing /_sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o/_/de la rig sngags 'di lags te/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/_/zhes bya ba ni/_sha za dang /_yi dgas dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon 'byung po rnams kyis mi tshugs shing /_ngo bo nyid dang bral
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]zhing mi dmigs pa'o/_/'jig rten dbang phyug gis kyang /_rig sngags legs par gsungs shing legs par nyon cig ces gsungs pa'o/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrungs te/_rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/_thabs dang
[\[322b.2\]]shes rab ma bral ba'o/_/mtshon pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te/_mtshon byed ni rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal lo/_/rigs ni rin po che'i rigs te/_phung po ni tshor ba'o/_/khams ni chu'i khams te/_skye mched ni sna'i skye mched do/_/ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas lnga'i
[\[322b.3\]]dbu rgyan can/_spyan gsum pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/_/zhal bzhi pa/_g.yas dkar po/_g.yon mthing ga_/rgyab dmar po'o/_/phyag brgyad pa/_sku mdog ser mo/_phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje 'dzin pa/_g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa/_phyag g.yas pa
[\[322b.4\]]gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa rnams ni ral gri dang /_rin po che dang /_mda' bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon pa gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa rnams na zhags pa dang /_'khor lo dang /_gzhu bsnams pa'o/_/zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs
[\[322b.5\]]shing /_pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing /_nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa ste/_lo bcu gnyis pa'i tshul du bzhugs shing /_sgeg pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'o/_/rig sngags dang gsang sngags gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni/_gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_u hu ha la ku li dzi pa la
[\[322b.6\]]sogs pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa 'di gzung bar gsol zhes bya ba ni/_sngags dang /_sbod gtong dang /_gzhan gyi rig pa dang /_ma rungs par byed pa'i 'byung po rnams/_rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang /_stobs kyis zlog par byed
[\[322b.7\]]pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi ngo bo 'di yang stong pa nyid yin te/_thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o/_/shes rab kyi ngo bo ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin te/_thabs kyi ngo bo ni rig sngags nyid do/_/de yang thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med cing /_mtshon pa dang mtshon byed kyang
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]gnyis su med do/_/rig sngags de'i rigs ni pad+ma'i rigs te/_phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o/_/khams ni me'i khams te/_skye mched ni lce'i skye mched do/_/ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid ni rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan can/_spyan gsum pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis
[\[323a.2\]]brgyan pa/_zhal bzhi pa/_phyag brgyad pa/_sku mdog dmar mo/_/phyag g.yas pa dang pos rdo rje snying gar brten pa/_g.yon pa dang pos dril bu dkur brten pa'o/_/g.yas gnyis pa na ral gri/_gsum pa na pad+ma/_g.yon gnyis pa na dgra sta dang /_gsum pa na rtse gsum
[\[323a.3\]]mo/_/de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o/_/zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs shing /_pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing /_nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan te/_zhal g.yas dkar po/_/g.yon mthing ga_/rgyab ser po/_/bzhad pa'i tshul du
[\[323a.4\]]bzhugs pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi gsang sngags pad+ma'i snying po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_i li i li la sogs pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni lo gcig gi bar du mtshams gcod pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_lo gcig gi sngon du yang srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/srung ba dang /_
[\[323a.5\]]sba ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_mtshams gcod pa dang /_dug zhi ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing /_rig sngags kyis yongs su bskyab par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang /_don thams cad sgrub pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[323a.6\]]de bzhin du byas par gyur na/_sdig can gyi rigs ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang mi 'ong ste/_gal te 'ong bar gyur na/_rig sngags kyi dmod mos brlag par 'gyur ro/_/bya ba thams cad grub cing bde bar gnas pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni/_bar du gcod pa'i de nas
[\[323a.7\]]so/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni/_de dang de ma slebs pa'i mtshams su 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang bar du gcod par byas te/_rig sngags 'di byung ba tsam gyis kyang /_bar du gcod par mi nus
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dis chad pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_nor bu rin po che lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba/_sngon
[\[323b.2\]]ma thos pa 'di yang thos nas/_skrag cing dngangs la mi dga' ste zhes bya ba ni/_khyad par du 'phags shing sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste/_de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kyang yin te/_ma rungs pa rnams la 'jigs par byed pa ngan song gsum nas 'byin pa'i gzugs
[\[323b.3\]]'di yang dag pa'o/_/skyi bung zhes byed nas sa la 'dzul/_kun du 'dzul/_kun du rab tu 'dzul bar byed do zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dang /_dmod mos sdig can gyi rigs 'byung po rnams/_de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid mthong bas ma tshugs par skad ngan grag
[\[323b.4\]]ste/_de rnams kyang sa la 'dzul zhing bying bar 'gyur ro/_/mthong bar mi gnas shing so so rang rang bros so/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams 'jigs pa'i de nas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul nas zhes bya ba ni/_sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams rdzu
[\[323b.5\]]'phrul sa la 'dzul du mi ster zhing /_rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/_rdo rje'i sa gzhir snang ba'o/_/de dag phyogs bzhir rgyug go zhes bya ba ni/_sdig can 'byung po bdud kyi rigs de rnams ni/_sa la 'dzul ma nus shing phyogs phyogs su bros te hag zad do/_/
[\[323b.6\]]de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams bros pa'i de nas so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po mngon par sprul to zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang /_phyogs mtshams thams cad du me sna tshogs
[\[323b.7\]]sprul zhing /_sdig can de rnams 'gror mi ster ba'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni/_tshig sbrel ba'i de nas so/_/de dag nam mkha' la rgyug go zhes bya ba ni/_sdig can rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la rgyug ste/_phyogs mtshams bzhi la 'dzul ba med cing nam mkha' la rgyug
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni/_nam mkha' la bros pa'i de nas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' gser du sprul to zhes bya ba ni/_nam mkha'i phyogs na rdo rje'i gser gyi sa gzhir byin gyis brlabs te/_sdig can de rnams kyang 'gro dbang med cing
[\[324a.2\]]rdugs pa'o/_/de nas zhes bya ba ni/_rdugs pa'i de nas so/_/'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lta bu dang /_dri zas bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/_steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas zhes bya ba ni/_sems can la gnod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[324a.3\]]sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_gzhan la srog 'phrog pa'i sems dang ldan pa sha stag_/sdig can gyi 'byung po de rnams 'gro sa mi rnyed cing mar log nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la skyab tshol ba'o/_/
[\[324a.4\]]gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod pa byed pa'i bar rnams gzhom pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_dpa' zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/_stobs dang ldan zhing sdig can bdud kyi rigs/_rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /_'byung
[\[324a.5\]]po thams cad bzlog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_'jig rten gyi khams su sems can gyi don du byams pa dang /_snying rje dang btang snyoms kyis khyab ste/_de lta bu'i thugs rjes khyab nas/_byad dang /_ro langs dang /_dug dang /_dug sbyor dang /_dug 'thung ba dang /_gzhan gyi rig pa dang /_sngags
[\[324a.6\]]dang /_sbod gtong dang /_'jig rten gyi ma mo dang /_ngan sngags sbyor ba dang /_sdig can bdud kyi rigs de rnams la sogs pa rig sngags kyi gzi brjid 'joms pa'o/_/'khor bzhi po rnams bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/_de bzhin du bdud kyi rigs 'byung
[\[324a.7\]]po la sogs pa bcom zhing /_bar chod med cing bde bar gnas te/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed do/_/rig sngags 'di brjod do zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rang bzhin gzhan gyis ma bcos par gnyug ma ste/_phyogs dang bral zhing rang bzhin med
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]pa de lta bu'i ye shes brjod pa'o/_/de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo las kyi rigs ni las thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/_las kyi gdon thams cad 'joms pa/_las thams cad grub pa/_sna tshogs kyi rigs su snang ba'o/_/de yang rig sngags kyi mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan
[\[324b.2\]]gyi ye shes so/_/mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi bdag nyid do/_/phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po'o/_/khams ni rlung gi khams so/_/skye mched ni lus kyi skye mched do/_/ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/_spyan gsum pa/_zhal bzhi pa/_phyag brgyad
[\[324b.3\]]pa/_sku mdog ljang nag_/zhal g.yas dkar po/_g.yon dmar po/_rgyab ser po/_phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje gdengs pa/_gnyis pa na ral gri/_/gsum pa rdo rje rgya gram mo/_/g.yon dang po na dril bu/_gnyis pa na zhags pa/_gsum pa na 'khor lo'o/_/
[\[324b.4\]]'og ma'i phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs shing /_zhabs g.yas pa pus mo btsugs pa/_g.yon brkyang ba/_bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin 'byung po rnams mnan pa'o/_/pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o/_/yan lag
[\[324b.5\]]thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/_khro bo 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs so/_/rig sngags kyi gsang sngags las kyi snying pos ni/_las thams cad 'grub cing bdud thams cad 'dul ba ste/_sems can thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/gsang sngags kyi
[\[324b.6\]]tshig ni 'di lta ste/_gi ma gi ma la sogs pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /_rig sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gang zag rig sngags la gus pa dang /_sems can thams cad dang /_de la
[\[324b.7\]]srung ba dang /_skyob par byed cing /_rig sngags kyi chos kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o/_/lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te zhes bya ba ni/_sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa/_nor thams cad gzhan gyi don du byin pa/_sems can
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]thams cad kyi don byed pa ste/_de lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/_nor lha lta bu 'byung ba'o/_/de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/_de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal po rnams dang /_'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/de yang
[\[325a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/_bdud rnams las rnam par rgyal zhing dgra rnams kyang ma lus te/_phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas pa ste/_de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das la/_bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/rdzogs pa'i
[\[325a.3\]]sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/_/kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/_/ces bya ba ni/_nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/_sku gsung thugs rdzogs par byas pas na rdzogs pa ste/_dug gsum dang bral zhing /_sangs rgyas pa'o/_/de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la
[\[325a.4\]]'dud ces bya ba'o/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog_/shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud/_/ces bya ba ni sngon bskal ba grangs med pa'i dus su tshogs rdzogs te/_da ltar ma lus par sems can thams cad rdzogs par 'dod nas/_theg pa sna tshogs dang /_
[\[325a.5\]]thabs sna tshogs bstan pa ste/_rkang gnyis kyi tshogs kyi dam pa/_phyi nang gi tshogs la mkhas pa/_thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad la byams pas khyab pa'o/_/de lta bu'i thub pa chen po la 'dud pa'o/_/gau tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/_/zhes bya ba
[\[325a.6\]]ni/_yang dag pa'i ye shes ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang de bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i ye shes shes pa ni lta ci smos te/_rang nyid kyis rang gi rig pa yang mi shes pa'o/_/rang gi rig pa ci'i phyir ma shes na/_rang la skyes pa'i ma rig pas ma shes pa'o/_/yang dag
[\[325a.7\]]dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/_/chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/_/zhes bya ba ni/_yang dag par bdud bzhi bcom ste/_de 'dul bas na dpa' bo ste/_de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pa la yang dag par 'dud de/_bdag cag kyang snying rje dang ldan zhing mchis pa'o zhes bya ba'o/_/gnod
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa las gud du dengs shig ces bya ba ni/_ma rungs pa'i sdig can 'byung po rnams ni/_gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang /_sems can rnams la gnod pa byas nas/_
[\[325b.2\]]rig sngags kyi dmod mos mgo bo ardza ka'i many+dza ra'i rdog pa bzhin du tshal par 'gas pa'o/_/gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la myur du ma dong na zhes bya ba ni/_rig pa mi 'chang ba'i gang du/_sdig pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis gzung bar gyur na/_de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis
[\[325b.3\]]gsungs pa bzhin du rig pa 'chang ste/_de'i chos bzhin du gang zag dang sems can la bsrung bar bya ste/_myur du ma thon na nyes pa chen por 'gyur ro/_/de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang /_nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi bka'
[\[325b.4\]]las 'das pa sdig can gtum po'i rigs 'byung po rnams ni nad drag po mdze dang /_phol mig dang /_'bras dang /_lhog pa dang /_sha bkra dang /_me dpal dang /_chu sbur dang /_'brum bu dang /_lus thams cad rul zhing g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis thebs
[\[325b.5\]]shing srog dang 'bral te/_shi 'phos nas kyang mnar med du skye ba med pa'o/_/de'i rkyen gyis mgo dang snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/_gang zag ji bzhin du gnod par byed bzhin te sdig can de yang sdug bsngal drag po ste/_nad chen pos btab
[\[325b.6\]]pa'o/_/de'i mod la sdug bsngal bu ma byung ba dang brlag pa dang /_mtha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po 'byung ste/_gar yang 'gros med cing lcang lo can gyi pho brang yang mi thob ste/_de'i lus kyang zhig cing rul bar 'gyur
[\[325b.7\]]ro/_/'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang /_skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang /_grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni/_'di 'don pa dang sgom pa dang yid la byed pa dang gdams ngag byin pa
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]dang /_bshad pa dang /_rjes su yi rang zhing 'chang ba ste/_de dag la gnod par 'gyur na/_rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'o/_/yang na rig sngags 'di mnyan nas/_sems can la 'tshe bar mi bya'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du
[\[326a.2\]]dengs shig ces bya ba ni/_gnod par byed pa de rnams gang zag dang sems can thams cad kyi don la myur du thon cig ces bya'o/_/yang na rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal myur du thob po zhes bya'o/_/gal te myur du ma dong na 'jigs pa chen po dang /_nad drag pos 'debs
[\[326a.3\]]par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das shing ma btang bar gyur na/_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_g.yan pa'i nad la sogs pas myur du thebs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur
[\[326a.4\]]zhes bya ba ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang /_rig sngags kyi dmod mos ardza ka'i mardza ri'i dogs pa bzhin du 'gas pa'o/_/de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang /_brlag pa dang mtha' med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin du rig
[\[326a.5\]]sngags kyis kyang dmod mos 'gros mi rnyed cing /_de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/_shi nas kyang mnar med kyi mes bsreg cing /_dmyal ba nas dmyal bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro/_/gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba/_/nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa/_/zhes
[\[326a.6\]]bya ba ni/_zas su khrag za ba dang sha za ba la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang /_sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa dang /_nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs pa rgyu zhing ma byed cig ces bya'o/_/de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/_/mdo bshad thos nas spang bar
[\[326a.7\]]gyis/_/zhes bya ba ni/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/_rig sngags 'di yang yang dag par gsungs te/_de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang /_rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba ste/_de bzhin du khyad par du 'phags pa'i mdo 'di thos par gyur
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]nas/_sems can la gnod par byed pas sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa thob pa'o/_/de bas na spang bar gyis zhes bya ba'o/_/sha za lus 'phags skem byed dang /_/'byung po 'jigs byed srul po rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par
[\[326b.2\]]byas te/_de yang dam la btags nas gnod par byed pa spangs pa'o/_/de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/_/mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas mthong /_/zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs te/_de bzhin rgyal po bzhi po
[\[326b.3\]]rnams kyis kyang dam tshig bsrung ste/_rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sdig can 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa'o/_/lha dang lha min rlung lha dang /_/dri za dang ni gdon gyi bla/_/zhes bya ba ni/_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis sems can thams cad la gnod par byas te/_
[\[326b.4\]]de yang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid dam pa thob pa'o/_/'byung po dang ni sha za dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams/_/zhes bya ba ni/_ser sna dang /_zhe sdang dang /_'dod chags kyi sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas te/_de yang rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas gnod mi
[\[326b.5\]]nus pa'o/_/kun du 'khrugs shing kun du g.yos/_/skrag cing kun du rab tu 'gul/_/zhes bya ba ni rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid dang /_stobs kyis sa lan drug tu g.yos te/_de bzhin du ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o/_/kun du 'khrugs shing kun du g.yos pa ni shar dma'
[\[326b.6\]]ste/_nub mtho ba'o/_/nub dma' na shar mtho ba'o/_/phyogs phyogs rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/mgo 'khrugs shing phyogs rnams gtor ba'o/_/de bas kyang skrag cing kun du 'gul ba ste/_yun ring zhing drag pa'o/_/gdon dang gnod pa byed pa rnams/_/lhung zhing rab tu pham
[\[326b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_sdig can bdud kyi rigs kyi 'byung po rnams ni/_sems can la gnod par byed bas rang pham ste/_sdug bsngal chen po thob cing rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa'o/_/sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos/_/sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed/_/ces bya
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]ba ni/_rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa g.yo zhing 'byung po rnams skrag par byed de/_sa de yang rnga bo che dang cha lang dang dril bu'i skad 'byung ngo /_/kun du rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya'o/_/yi dgas dang ni grul
[\[327a.2\]]bum rnams/_/sdang ba'i gdon ni zlog byed pa'o/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po de rnams kyang sems can drag pos gnod par byas te/_gzhan gang gis kyang mi thub cing de'i gnyen po lta bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/_mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur na/_/'jigs pa
[\[327a.3\]]drag po 'bebs par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba ni/_gnod byed sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_sems can gyi srog 'dod pa rnams/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis rlag par byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge
[\[327a.4\]]'dun la/_/dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa/_/zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod de/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la dga' zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams skyong bar byed de/_sangs rgyas kyi
[\[327a.5\]]bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o/_/rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o/_/de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas/_/legs par rjes su yi rang ngo /_/zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems
[\[327a.6\]]dpa'i rigs 'byung de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi chos la dga' zhing snga nas kyang chos la dad pa yod do/_/de ltar dad pa kun du rab tu skyes nas/_dga' bas rab tu dga' ste/_chos la mchod pa legs par mchod nas/_/de rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ngo
[\[327a.7\]]zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi 'byung po dam la btags pa'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o//_//de nas zhes bya ba ni/_'byung po dam la btags pa'i de nas so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi bar snang las babs nas zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po chen po de yang
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]chos la rab tu dga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das la snga nas kyang dad pa skyes te/_da ltar yang rab tu skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_lhags nas zhes bya ba ni/_so so rang gi 'od zer yang 'phags te/_

[\[327b.3\]]chen po bzhi rab tu dga' nas zhabs kyi pad+ma la gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_de nas bcom
[\[327b.4\]]ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o/_/gros mthun pa dang /_tshig mthun pa dang /_skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba ni dbyangs gcig tu byas shing /_rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi chos la gus pa'i sems kyis bcom
[\[327b.5\]]ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni zhes bya ba ni srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis khyab ste/_sdang ba'i sems zhi bar byed pa
[\[327b.6\]]'khor ba rnams bcom zhing yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam bstan pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po bzhis zhabs la phyag bgyi ba dang zhes bgyi ba ni gus par bya ba phyag 'tshal te/_rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang bsrung zhing /_ngag gis 'don pa dang /_yid kyis bzung ba
[\[327b.7\]]dang /_lus kyis bcang bar byas te/_rig sngags 'di yang btags nas kyang /_ngan song gsum du mi 'gro zhing byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o/_/'khor bzhi po rnams la bsrung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]ma la sogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang bsrung ba'i dam pa'o/_/yongs su skyob pa dang zhes bya ba ni/_gzhan las kyang khyad par du 'phags te/_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/gnod sbyin dang srin po nas
[\[328a.2\]]gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lags so zhes bya ba ni/_ma rungs pa bdud kyi rigs rnams kyi 'byung po de yang 'joms shing rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po
[\[328a.3\]]chen po bzhi dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la rig sngags 'di 'dri bar byed pa ste/_de yang 'khor bzhi la rtag tu srung bar byed pa'o/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das la
[\[328a.4\]]rtag tu 'khor ba'i 'khor bzhi yin te/_rig sngags kyis kyang de dag srung zhing bar gcod bsal te rtag tu bde ba thob pa'o/_/bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_brjod par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi
[\[328a.5\]]rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di dur khrod chen po yi dgas dang /_'byung po rnams kyi gnyen po/_mi'i sems can rnams kyi ston pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skyong bar byed pa ste/_'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang 'chang ba dang /_bzung
[\[328a.6\]]nas kyang sems can thams cad la bstan nas/_sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/_'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang lus ngag yid gzung ba'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang
[\[328a.7\]]du zhu ba 'bul ba'o/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni/_'khor bzhi po dag dang /_sems can thams cad la bsrung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed de/_'di'i lam nas kyang byang chub
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]kyi tshogs bstan pa'o/_/bdag bsrung ba dang /_bdag sba ba dang /_gzhan bsrung ba dang /_gzhan sba ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/_gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams srung ba ste/_byams pa dang /_snying rje'i lam nas bdag gis
[\[328b.2\]]kyang sems can gyi don la bstan par bya'o/_/bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_brjod pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa de la ni zhes bya ba ni/_stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/_thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa ste/_chos dang /_
[\[328b.3\]]longs spyod dang /_sprul pa'i skus khyab pa ste/_de bzhin du 'di la gus pa byas pa'i gang zag ni/_sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral ba'o/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/_gnod par bgyid
[\[328b.4\]]pa ltag la sems lags zhes bya ba ni/_mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/_dpa' ba stobs che zhing sems can rnams la byams pa dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa ste/_gang zag 'di 'chang ba la da lta'i rkyen lta ci smos te/_tshe phyi ma la yang de bzhin no/_/de gang du
[\[328b.5\]]mtshan gcig tsam gnas pa der yang zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di yang grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs la sogs pa la yi ge gcig tsam yang dag par gyur na/_de bzhin du 'byung po'am/_yi dgas
[\[328b.6\]]la sogs pas gnod par mi 'gyur te/_grong de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang khrag khrug dang /_rtsod pa dang /_rims drag po'i nad mi 'byung ste/_gzhan gyi rgyal po'i chad pa yang mi 'byung ngo /_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar

[\[329a.1\]]de'i 'od zer gyi gzi brjid kyis rgyang grags kyi bar tshun chad du yang nye bar mi nus so/_/de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes bya ba ni/_rig sngags 'di yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis

[\[329a.4\]]nyes pa dang /_bri nyes la sogs pa gso ba dang /_bkra mi shis pa bkra shis par byed pa dang /_gzhan yang de la sogs pa thams cad la sngags te/_gzhan yang mkha' la rgyu ba'i yi dgas rnams bzlog pa'i cho ga yang dag par bshad par bya'o/_/lci ba chu dang
[\[329a.5\]]'dres pa yis/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag byug par bya/_/nad pa'i mdun du yang dag tu/_/de bzhin gzhan yang mkhas pas shes/_sa tshon lngas ni yang dag tu/_/rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par bris/_/dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la/_/phyi rim rdo rje ra ba ste/_/
[\[329a.6\]]de phyir 'khor lo sna tshogs rtsibs/_/de phyir lha snam zlum por bri/_/de yi phyi rim gru bzhi la/_/lha snam pad+ma rA ga'i mdog_/gru bzhi sgo bzhi ka ba brgyad/_/twa ra bzhi yis yang dag brgyan/_/dra ba la sogs brgyan pa la/_/rin chen sna bdun gzhal yas
[\[329a.7\]]khang /_/gdugs dang ba dan de bzhin rgyan/_/mdzes pas yang dag rnam par brgyan/_/pad+ma 'khor lo lha rnams dang /_/ye shes lha dang 'jig rten lha/_/gzhan yang gsungs pa de bzhin du/_/mkhas pa'i blo yis shes par bya/_/bzhi ba'i dbus su yang

[\[329b.1\]]dag tu/_/rnam par rgyal ba dbus su gzhag_/lto ba ldir ba rke ba ring /_/mchu 'phyangs mtshan ma legs pa la/_/nag po ra ri rtsa ba spangs/_/de lta bu yi bum pa la/_/gu gul la sogs bdug par bya/_/rin chen 'bru lnga sman lnga dang /_/dri lnga byang chub

[\[329b.3\]]de ni bkra shis la sogs dang /_/dbang bskur sbyin sreg de bzhin te/_/lha dang rab gnas de bzhin shes/_/rdo rje slob dpon mkhas pa yis/_/dkyil chog blo yis yang dag shes/_/grog shing shun dar sogs la/_/gur gum gi wang la sogs bri/_/phyi rim mu

[\[329b.5\]]mtshams bzhi rdo rje rgya gram yin/_/be con dang ni ut+pal dang /_/pad+ma la sogs 'khor lo dang /_/gzhan yang phyag mtshan gang yod pa/_/mkhas pas brtags nas bri bar bya/_/de nas mu khyud zlum po la/_/rdo rje rgya gram yang dag bri/_/rdo rje rgya gram bar du ni/_/

[\[330a.1\]]ba'i tshal gyi bskyed yig bri/_/yi ge'i nang du mkhas pa ni/_/yang dag gis ni bri bar bya/_/de bzhin rig sngags 'chang bris la/_/mgul lam phyag sogs gdags par bya/_/de bzhin btags par gyur na ni/_/nad dang 'jigs pas mi tshugs te/_/mya ngan la sogs

[\[330a.7\]]pa'i gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin no/_/bde bar 'gyur zhing thar bar 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/_tshe da lta dang phyi ma la yang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar ba'o/_/mi ma lags pa rnams de la log pa mi bgyid cing /_myur du 'chi bar 'gyur lags te zhes bya ba ni 'di 'chang

[\[330b.1\]]ba'i gang zag rnams la 'byung po de rnams grogs mi byed na 'byung po de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po thob par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/_rgyal po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o/_/bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni/_de ltar don

[\[331a.1\]]gyur na/_gdug pa can gyi gnod sbyin rnams kyang dad par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal po chen po dag ces bya ba ni/_bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di la rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang 'di la 'chang bar 'gyur na/_dad par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du yang dag pa'i don yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/
